GSP29vytrkt3u:34: yadvā pramāṇāntarānugrāhaka 3 manuktvā vedānugrāhakoktiḥ kuta ityato vedarūpaḥ śabdaḥ pradhānamityuktatvāditi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:35: “yāthārthameva mānatvaṃ tanmukhyaṃ jñānaśabdayoḥ“iti yuktipādīyānuvyākhyāne“yāthārthyameva prāmāṇyaṃ tanmukhyaṃ jñānaśabdayoḥ“iti brahmatarke ca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:36: tadyāyārthyaṃ jñāne kevalapramāṇe vedarūpapramāṇe ca mukhyamityasya tātparyaṃ - pradhānamityuktatvāditi //
GSP29vytrkt3u:37_0: vedānugrāhakatvaṃ ca-- vede āropitāni yāni aprāmāṇyakāraṇāni anṛtavyāghātapunaruktyaśakyārthābhidhāyitvagurūpāyabodhakatvārthabodhopāyaśūnyatvādīni
GSP29vytrkt3u:41: niṣkrāntā doṣebhyaḥ nirdeṣā sā ca sā upapattiśca nirdeṣopapattiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:43: atropapattipadaṃ arthavādopapattī cetyādāviva hetvābhāsaviviktayuktiparaṃ cet nirdeṣeti vyarthamityata āha --
GSP29vytrkt3u:53: atropapattirvyāpyamityetāvataiva pūrtāvapi yuktiliṅgagrahaṇaṃ bhagavatpādaiḥ“ranumā yuktirevokte“ti“liṅgaṃ heturi“ti coktatvena 2 tadvirodha iti śaṅkānirāsāya/
GSP29vytrkt3u:54: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāntu -- sāhacaryeṇārthagamakaṃ liṅgamiti sāhacaryaniyamarūpavyāptau niyamāṃśatyāgena sāhacaryamātramuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:59: tatkathamityataḥ paryāyatvānna doṣa iti bhāvenāha-- uktaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:68_1: eva tatphalasya viśeṣaṇāntaralabhyatvāttadanuktiritibhāvena virodhaṃ nirāha-- pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ tviti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:86: nanu vyāpteḥ karma vyāpyamiti vyāpyasvarūpaṃ vyāptijñānādhīnajñānamiti kā vyāptiriti jijñāsāyāṃ paddhatyuktalakṣaṇamāha -- avinābhāva iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:96: sādhyena vinābhāva ityasya sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāve ityarthakatayā asya vyatirekavyāptitvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:99: “avinābhāvo vyāptiḥ sāhacaryaniyama iti yāvadi“ti paddhatyukterāha-- sādhyasāhityeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:109: etena sāhacaryaniyamo vānopādhika 1 saṃbandho vā svābhāvikasaṃbandho vā sādhyābhāvavadavṛttitvaṃ vā vyāptiriti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:110: vyadhikaraṇayoḥ pūravṛṣṭyordeśataḥ kālato vā sāhacaryasya saṃbandhasya 2 cābhavāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:112: ucyate/ yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhasya yasya yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhe yena vinānupapattistasya tena sā vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:119: pūrvamavinābhāva ityasyābhipretatvamupetya sāhityaniyamo dūṣito 'tra tu pṛthagvyā 3 ptilakṣaṇatvena sākṣādukta 4 tvamupetya punarupanyāsa iti na punaruktidoṣaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:132: anupapattervyāptitvaṃ ca - pramāṇalakṣaṇe pariśeṣorthāpattiranumānamityaviśeṣa itya 1 rthāpattirivānumānamapyāvaśyakānupapattyai gamakamityuktatvāt;
GSP29vytrkt3u:133: upamānepi na hi svasadṛṣenādṛśaṃ kva 2 cciddṛṣṭamityanena gavayaniṣṭhagosādṛśyasya goniṣṭhagavayasādṛśyaṃ vinānupapatterevoktatvāt;
GSP29vytrkt3u:134_0: paddhatau ca nirdeṣopapattiranumeti pramāṇalakṣaṇastho 3 papattiśabdo na paryāyāntaramātram
GSP29vytrkt3u:134_1: kiṃ tu sādhye satyupapadyate anyathā tu ne 4 tyupapattiriti bhāvenopapattirvyāpyamati vyākhyātatvāt;
GSP29vytrkt3u:135_0: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāmapi jīvanavatve sati gṛhe asatvarūpe vyāpye anupapadyamānārthapramitirarthāpattirityanupapadyamānapadayogāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:135_1: pariśeṣāderanumānatvānaṅgīkāre dhūmopyanupapatyā gamayannānumānaṃ syā 5 diti coktatvāt; --
GSP29vytrkt3u:155: yattu -- vimato gaurgavayasadṛśaḥ gavayagatasādṛśyapratiyogitvāditi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ hetusādhyayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃpādanaṃ tatparamatamāśritya/
GSP29vytrkt3u:157: ata eva 1 paddhatau ca asau gauretadgavayasadṛśaḥ asya gavayasya 2 tadgosadṛśatvāditi vaiyidhikaraṇyenaiva prayuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:162_0: nanvevaṃ śābarokta 6 pramāṇāntarbhāvaprastāve gaurgavayasadṛśī gavayasya gosadṛśatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt3u:162_1: prayoge vaiyadhikaraṇyamāśaṅkya sāmānādhaikaraṇyena prayogoktiḥ katham tayā vyadhikaraṇasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:172: yā tu -- pareṇa vyāptyā gamakamanumānam anupapatyā gamikārthāpattirityanumānārthāpatyorbhede śaṅkite taṃ prati ṭīkākārīyā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:173: kena cidvinā kasya cidanupapattirhi tayorvyāptiṃ vinā nopapadyata ityanupapattivyāptyorbhedoktiḥ sānupapattiniyāmakordhvādharībhāvakāryakāraṇabhāvādyabhiprāyā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:175: iyameva ca vyāptiḥ sādhyena vinā sādhanasyābhāvo 'nupapattiriti bhāvenāvinābhāva iti sāhacaryaniyama iti cocyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:178: yena vinā yasya sattā pramāṇaviruddhā sā tena tasya vyāptirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:179: upapatteśca vyāptyapekṣā 2 sarvathāṅgīkāryeti pramāṇalakṣaṇavākyaṭīkoktivirodhaṃ nirāha -- yātviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:183: sāhacaryaniyama iti yāvat iti paddhatyuktivirodha ityata āha-- iyameveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:193: iyaṃ ca vyāptiḥ prasiddheṣu dhūmādyanumāneṣu adhodeśe 1 na dīpūrādyanumāneṣvarthāpatyādirūpānumāneṣu
GSP29vytrkt3u:194: ātmāśrayānyonyāśrayacakrakānavasthāvyāghātā 2 pādakeṣu tarkeṣu kevalavyatirekiṣu kevalānvayiṣu ca sarvatrānugatā āvaśyakī ca /
GSP29vytrkt3u:202: anopādhikasaṃbandhādirūpavyāptiṃ hitvaitadupādāne ko viśeṣa ityata āha-- iyaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:219: nanu -- dhūmasyānupapattiḥ kiṃ vahnisāmānyaṃ vinā kiṃ vā parvatīyavanhiṃ vinā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:224: siddhau ca tasyā evānumitirūpaphalatvena tatkāraṇatvāyogāt iti1 /
GSP29vytrkt3u:225: uktaṃ hi khaṇḍane -- yato 'nyatvaṃ tatsiddheragre tadasiddherita 2 iti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:226: 3 dhūmasya sāmānādhikaraṇyamapi kiṃ vahnisāmānyena kiṃ vā parvatīyavahnineti vikalpya taddūṣaṇayoḥ sāmyāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:236: na ca sāmānyasiddhyā tatsiddhiḥ yato 'nyatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣayo 5 rityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:238: yattu -- asya vyatirekavyāptitvena tvanmate 'numānānaṅgatvācceti tadāśaṅkya nirāha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:240: 1. iti padaṃ na -ṭa.rā. 2.tīti ce-ga.rā. 3.cenna-ka.ga.rā. 4.-tatpha-ga.ṭa.rā. 5.na cetyādi nāsti -ṭa.ḍa.
GSP29vytrkt3u:247: vṛṣṭirūpasādhyābhāvavatyadhodeśe pūrarūpasādhanābhāvasyābhāvena vyatirekavyāptyabhāve 'pi pūre vṛṣṭiṃ vināpapatti 1 darśanāt 2 /
GSP29vytrkt3u:251: sā ca vahnyabhāvena dhūmābhāve sādhye vyāpyagatatvādanvayavyāptitvenaivāṅgam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:252: dhūmānaiva vahnau sādhye tu dhūmāniṣṭatvānna sākṣādaṅgam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:255: sāmānādhikaraṇyagarbhā 4 vyatirekavyāptiriyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vādinaṃ pratyāhaṃ -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:256: nanvastviyaṃ sarvānvayyanumāneṣu vahnyabhāvādinā dhūmābhāvādyanumānumānasthalenyaiva vyāptirvācyeti tadanugateyaṃ na bhavatītyata āha-- vahnyabhāvasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:257: iyameva 5 dhūmānumāne 'pyaṅgaṃ kathaṃ na vyatirekavyāptirityata āha -- dhūmeneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:260: kevalānvayini sādhyā 6 bhāvāprasiddhyāvyāptirityuktadoṣaṃ nirāha--na ca kevalānvayinīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:267: tatra sādhyābhāvā 1 satvenaiva sādhyābhāve sati sādhanasya yopapattiḥ tadabhāvarūpānupapatteḥ satvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:269: tathā ca -- rasasya samānadeśakālena rūpeṇa vineva,
GSP29vytrkt3u:270: pākajarūpādeḥ samānadeśena bhinnakālena pākena vineva 2 ca,
GSP29vytrkt3u:275: na hyūrdhvadeśagato nadīpūraḥ 6 ūrdhvadeśagatāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vinānupapannaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:282: yathā tatra nyāyamate kathañcitsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃpādya vyāptirupapādyate tathā kleśena vinaiva yathāsthitaliṅgaliṅganorvaiyadhikaraṇye satyapītyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:283: nanu tvanmatepi tatra sāmānādhikaraṇyamādāyaiva vyāptirucyatāmityata āha-- pratyuteti 7 //
GSP29vytrkt3u:291: nanu sādhyābhāvenaiva saṃbandhasya nadīpūrasya vṛṣṭirūpasādhyena kathaṃ vyāptiriticet sādhyābhāvena niyamena saṃbanddhasya dravyatvasya saṃyogarūpasādhyena kathaṃ vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:292: yaditu tatra phalabalena vyāptilakṣaṇe pratiyogyasamānādhikaraṇeti viśeṣaṇāvdyāptisiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:294: nanu vaiyadhikaraṇye sādhyasya deśaniyamaḥ kathamiti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:307: pratiyogyasāmānādhikaraṇasādhyapratiyogiko yoḥ'bhāvaḥ tadasaṃbaddhatve sati sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiriti viśeṣaṇādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:308: tathāca saṃyogābhāvasya pratiyogisāmānādhikaraṇyānna doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:314: ata eva paddhatau tulonnamanādīnāmanekeṣāmapi liṅgaliṅgibhāvo darśitaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:318: kathaṃ ca samānakālatvepi kādācitkena patanena sthāyigurutvasya,
GSP29vytrkt3u:322: yatra yadā rasastatra tadā rūpamiti samānadeśakālatveneva,
GSP29vytrkt3u:323: yatra pākajaṃ 1 tatra pāka iti samānadeśatvasātreṇeva,
GSP29vytrkt3u:325: yadāyatra nadīpūrastatpūrvakāle tadūrdhvadeśe vṛṣṭiriti bhinnadeśakālatvenaiva vyāptigrahāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:326: nanu -- deśathaḥ kālataśca vaiyidhikaraṇye kathaṃ vyāptigahaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:327: yatredaṃ tatredamiti vā yadaivaṃ 3 tadaivamiti vā deśataḥ kālato vā sāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva vyāptergrāhgatvāditi cenna 4 /
GSP29vytrkt3u:330: “vyāptiprakāramapekṣyaliṅgasya liṅjñānajanakatvaniyamādi“ti paddhatyuktadiśā pareṇa samādhānaṃ vācayitvā samamityāha -- vyāptīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:334: nanu vaiyidhikaraṇyepi vyāpyavyāpakabhāve hetutadābhāsavyavasthā na syādityata āha-- atraceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:341: atra ca yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhasya hetoranupapattiḥ taddeśakāle hetorabhāva evāsiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:343: evaṃ yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhasya hetoranupapattiḥ taddeśakālayoranyatrāpi bhāvo vyabhicāraḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:346: na tu niyamena sādhyābhāvavati vartamāna iti na kaścitkṣudropadravaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:351: 2 ata eva vyadhikaraṇāsiddhirna doṣa iti vakṣyate//
GSP29vytrkt3u:379_1: tatrāpi dhūmajātīyasya vahnijātīyena vyāptiriti matāśritāni pratiyogyasamānādhikaraṇayatsamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakānavacchinnaṃ yattena samaṃ ---
GSP29vytrkt3u:392_2: yadvahnyādi tena yena kenāpi saha tasya dhūmādeḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃyogasaṃbandhenaikādhikaṇavṛttitvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:404_1: abhāvepi parvatīyavahnirapi mahānasīyavahniriva vahnitvenāvacchinna iti tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamādāya
GSP29vytrkt3u:407: tathā ca na sarvadhūmasya sarveṇa vahninā vyāptiḥ sidhyati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:408: tathāpi pratiyogitānavacchedakāvacchinnaṃ yaditi nañvyatyāsena pakṣadharādyuktadiśā vyākhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:414: evaṃ tenetyatra tadavacchinnena samaṃ tadavacchinnasyetyapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt3u:415: ata evādipadaprayogaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ ṭīkākṛdādyutprekṣitānāṃ parigrahāya kṛtaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:434_1: tatpratiyogi yanna bhavati parvatīyavahnyādirna bhavati tena samaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:447: -- viśeṣaṇā 1 dānālladhūnyanyonyābhāvagarbhāṇi yatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ yanna bhavati tena samaṃ tasya 2 sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptirityādīni,
GSP29vytrkt3u:448: tathā yatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogi yadvanna bhavati tena samaṃ tasya 3 sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptirityādīni;
GSP29vytrkt3u:459: tena vahninā samaṃ dhūmasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:460: asya lakṣaṇasya maṇāvanaktatvepi atyantābhāvagarbhalakṣaṇe avacchedakaghaṭitasyoktyā anyonyābhāvagarbhalakṣaṇepyuktaprāyatayā tadabhipretatvādupanyāsaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:462: yadvā yatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogi yadvanna bhavati tena samaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:463: tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vā svasamānādhikarānyonyābhāvapratiyogi yadvanna bhavati tatkatvaṃ veta maṇyuktalakṣaṇadvayasyāpaunaruktyāya pariṣkārapūrvaṃ evaṃ dvedhānuvādo bodhyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:464_1: tadavacchinnena yena yasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tayorvyāptirityevaṃ rūpāṇāṃ saṃbhāvitānāṃ grahaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt3u:471_0: 1 anaupādhikasaṃbandha ityasya vivaraṇarūpāṇi tatrāpi sādhyavyāpakeṣu sādhanāvyāpukatvaniṣedhaparyavasitāni
GSP29vytrkt3u:475_1: vā sādhanāvyāpakānāṃ sādhyāvyāpakatvena veti dvedheti hṛdi kṛtvā pakṣadharādyuktarītyāha-- tatrāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:492: tathā svābhāvika 1 sambandho vyāptirityasya vivaraṇarūpāṇi yatsāmānādhikaraṇyāvacchedakarūpavatvaṃ yasya tasya sā vyāptirityādīni ca;
GSP29vytrkt3u:497_0: maṇau paścāduktasya pūrvamanuvādaḥ pūrvamuktasya paścādanuvādastu sādhyavyāpakatvasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:497_1: bhāvarūpatayā pūrvabhāvitvācca paścāttanasādhanāvyāpakatvābhāva eva pūrvaṃ vācyamityabhiprāya ityeke /
GSP29vytrkt3u:502: dhūme vahnisāmānādhikaraṇyāvacchedakaṃ rūpaṃ dhūmatvaṃ tadvatvaṃ dhūmasya vyāptirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:503: yatsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ yasya tasya sāvyāptirityuktau vyabhicāriṇo 'pi vyāpyatāpatteravacchedaketyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:546: na kvāpyuktarūpābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakānavacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dhūmasya labhyata ityasaṃbhava iti tātparyāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:547: navyañtyāsena pratiyogitānavacchedakāvacchinnatvamartha iti pakṣadharoktamanūdya nirāha-- pratiyogiteti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:558: kiñca yasya yadatyantābhāvāsamānādhikaraṇatve sati yena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tena tasya sā vyāptirityevāstu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:564_3: vahnau nāstīti vaktāraṃ pratyāha-- kiṃ ca yasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:587: kiñcātrādhikaraṇaṃ deśa eva vā kāla eva vā ubhayaṃ vā ubhayānugatamadhikaraṇasāmānyaṃ vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:590: asti hi tayorapi yadā gotvaṃ tadāśvatvamiti vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:593: asti hi tayorapi 1 yatrapākajaṃ rūpaṃ tatra pāka iti vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:598: dvaiśikyāṃ vyāptau deśodhikaraṇaṃ kālikyāṃ kāla iti cet na/
GSP29vytrkt3u:618: kiñca tvanmatepi nityadravyāṇāṃ niradhikaraṇatvātteṣāṃ yadākāśaḥ tadā 1 nityadravyamiti vyāptirna syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:619: nanu kāla ākāśāderadhikaraṇaṃ ākāśaḥ sadā 2 stītyabādhitapratīterapi cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:621: kiṃ ca sarvatrākāśa ityapi pratatīterdeśopyākāśādhikaraṇaṃ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:622: nanu -- svarūpasaṃbandhenākāśaḥ sadā sarvatrāsti samavāyavṛttyā tu nāstīti tayā vṛtyā 3 rūpādeḥ prameyatvādeścātyantābhāvopi kevalānvayī syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:627: kevalānvayyabhāpratiyogitvaṃ sadā sarvatra satvaṃ ca saṃbandhabhedena yuktimityāśaṅkya pratibandyā nirāha-- nanvityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:629: 1.kālīdiriti vyā-ṭa. digiti vyā-ga.rā. 2.api padaṃ madhikam-ga.ṭa. 3.tyā gaganātyantābhāvaḥ kevalānvayīti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:630: tarhi rūpādikaṃ prameyatvādikaṃ ca saṃyogavṛtyā kutrāpi neti tayā vṛtyā rūpādeḥ prameyatvādeścātyantābhāvopi kevalānvayī syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:637: gaganātyantābhāvopi svarūpasaṃbandhenaiva sarvatrāsti na tu saṃyogādivṛttyeti gaganātyantābhāvātyantābhāvarūpaṃ gaganamapi kevalānvayi syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:641: api caivaṃ samānādhikaraṇasādhāyasādhanavyaktiviśeṣayoreva vyāptiriti mate pṛthivītvasya gandhaṃ prati vyāpyatvaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:648: prathamalakṣaṇaṃ nirasya dvitīyalakṣaṃ ca nirāha-- apicaivamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:649: nanu tādṛśātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ yanna bhavati tadavacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ lakṣaṇārthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:650: bhavati ca gandhatvamanavacchedakaṃ pṛthivīgandhavatī netyapratīteriticettarhi pūrvalakṣaṇābheda eva//
GSP29vytrkt3u:651: kathañcidbhedabhimāne tu tuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyena doṣāntaramāha-- api ca gotvasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:655: api ca gotvasya govyaktiṃ prati kālikī vyāptiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:657: evaṃ pṛthivītvasya gandhena saha kālikī vyāptiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:663: tathātve hi gotvasyāśvatvaṃ pratyapi kālikī vyāptirna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:671: tasya govyaktya 4 ntarābhāvasamānādhaikaraṇatvādityāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ca govyakteriti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:684: na ca sādhyasya vyāptiśarīrāntargatayā vṛtyā sādhanasamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvā 2 pratiyogitvaṃ vivakṣitam,
GSP29vytrkt3u:687: na ca samavāyavṛtyā vahnyatyantābhāvasya saṃyogavṛtyā vahnisamānādhikaraṇatayā pratiyogivyadhikaraṇapadenaiva tannirāsa iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:688: yena hi sambandhena yatra hi 3 pratiyogino bhāvaḥ tenaiva sambandhena tatra pratiyogino 'vṛttireva hi pratiyogivaiyadhikaraṇyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:690: yattu tadāśvatthātyantābhāvasya kāle satvepi tasya pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇatvāt pratiyogivyadhikaraṇapadena tannirāsa iti tanna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:691: yena hi saṃbandhenetyādivakṣyamāṇadiśā tasyāpi pratiyogivyadhikaraṇatvādvya 4 ktyantarābhāvasyāpi vyaktidaśāyāṃ pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇatvenoktadoṣāparihārācca //
GSP29vytrkt3u:694: 5 athāpi samavāyavatṛtyā vahnyabhāvasamānādhikaraṇyena dhūmasyāvyāpyatāpattirnetyāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca samavāyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:701: anyathā kāle sarvābhāvānāṃ pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇatayā pratiyogivyadhikaraṇā 1 siddheḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:715: samavāyasaṃbandhena ca vahneravartanāt prāguktadoṣaḥ sustha eveti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:723: mūle kapisaṃyogo netivat mūle vṛkṣaḥ kapisaṃyukto netyabādhitapratīteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:728: nanu -- yaḥ saṃyogābhāvavānvṛkṣaḥ sa eva saṃyukta iti pratyabhijñāvirodha iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:729: pratyabhijñā hi kimabhedaṃ vidhatte kiṃ vā bhedaṃ niṣedhati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:741: nanvekasminneva vṛkṣe saṃyuktābhedaḥ saṃyuktabhedaśca kathaṃ virodhādityata āha-- virodhasya ceti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:742: yathāgrāvacchedena vṛkṣe kapisaṃyogo mūlāvacchedena tadatyantābhāvaḥ evamagrāvacchedena saṃyuktavṛkṣābhedo mūlāvacchedena bheda ityupapatterityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:747: anumitijñānaparyālocanayāpyasmaduktavyāptijñānameva kāraṇaṃ na tvaduktamatopi na tvaduktavyāptilakṣaṇaṃ yuktamityāha -- kiñcānumatīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:753: -- na cenmūle saṃyuktānyonyābhāvātyantābhāvarūpo yaḥ 1 saṃyogastaddhīśca syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:756: kiṃ cānumitihetuḥ kimatyantābhāvādigarbhāṇāmuktasarvavyāptīnāṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ vā ladhvyā anyonyābhāvagarbhāyā eva jñānaṃ yadvā kadācitka 2 syacijjñānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:769: anaupādhika 3 saṃbandhatvasya dvedhā vivaraṇaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tatra sādhyavyāpakavyāpyatvaparyavasitānaupādhikaratvajñānamanumitiheturuta
GSP29vytrkt3u:771: 1.yaḥ iti nāsti-ka.ṭa.rā. 2.syāści-ga.ka.ṭa.rā. 3.dhikatvasya dvedhā- ḍa. kasaṃbandhatvasya dve -ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:787: naca niyāmakatvaṃ saṃsargavidhayaiva saṃbandhaviśeṣyakaṃ saṃbandhaviśeṣaṇakaṃ vā vyāptijñānaheturiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:789: tathā ca saṃbandhatvaṃ prakāra evetyavaśyaṃ vācyatvenātmāśrayāparihārāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:790: yattu viśiṣṭadhīniyāmakatvarūpasaṃbandhatvasya prakāratvena bhānāvaśyaṃbhāvastadāpi saṃyogatvādinā rūpeṇaiva bhānamiti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:797: tasmāditi// doṣāṇāṃ samyagupapāditatvāditi vā aparihāryatvāditi vārthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:832: nanu tarkaṃ vinā vyāptyagrahāttarkasya ca vyāptidhīsāpekṣatvādanavastheti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:833: atra kecit -- yatrāptavākyena vyāptirna tatra tarkāpekṣā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:849: atrārucibījaṃ tu śraddhayā siddhatvepi nyāyatonupapāditatve nyāyāsādhye niḥśaṅkapravṛtterayogāt tadarthaṃ nyāyānusaṃdhāne syādevānavasthetyevaṃ jñeyam// anādīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:856: na cātra dehātmatvādāviva bādhostīti na tatra tarkā 2 pekṣā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:859: kiñca yā nirdeṣaśrutyā nardeṣajñānarūpasākṣiṇā vā siddhāvyāptirna tatra tarkāpekṣā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:861: anādisiddhatvena jñātā niḥśaṅkamavagamyamānāḥ ye kāryakāraṇabhāvāḥ tanmūlāḥ kecana tarkā bījābhāve aṅkurābhāva ityādayaḥ ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:863: tatra yuktyādibādho yathā na tathānādisiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvamūlatarkeṣvastīti na tatra tarkāpekṣetyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:864: nanvayaṃ pakṣaḥ maṇāveva kāryakāraṇabhāvāderanādisiddhatvepi tatra pramāṇānusāraṇe 'numāna eva paryavasānādanavasthaiveti dūṣita ityataḥ pakṣāntaramāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:871: nanvayamapi pakṣaḥ stanyapānādāvanavasthoddhāropi bahvanidhūmayorvyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāmanavastheti pakṣadharādau dūṣita iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:877: gauḥ na padā spṛṣṭavyetyādau yo brāhmaṇaḥ sa na hantavya ityādivyāptiḥ śrutisiddhā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:884: anyāpi vyāptidhīratraiva viśrāmyatīti nānavasthā/ uktaṃ hi --
GSP29vytrkt3u:888_1: sahakāriṇa iti paddhatau upādhyabhāvaniścayasya sahakāritvoktiḥ sopādhiśaṅkāsthalābhiprāyā
GSP29vytrkt3u:897: sarvavyāptidhiyastatraiva paryavasānaṃ vivādinaṃ prati bhūyodarśanavāde maṇau siddhāntitaṃ pakṣamupetyāha-- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:908: pārthivatvalohalekhyatvayostu vajra eva vyabhicāradarśanāttadagrahaḥ/ uktaṃ hi --
GSP29vytrkt3u:913: sā ca kvicitkena 1 tarkeṇa nirasyata iti na 2 tatra tarkāpekṣā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:918: nanvevaṃ yatpārthivaṃ tallohalekhyamiti bahuṣu sthaleṣu sahacāradarśanāvdyabhicārādarśanācca vyāptigrahaḥ syādityata āha -- pārthivatveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:923: talliṅgaṃ dhūmādikaṃ vahnyādisādhyavyabhicāreddhā sarvathāpyadṛṣṭa eva sati tasya vahneḥ sādhakaṃ vyāpyaṃ na tu vyabhicāradarśane 3 pramāṇabādhe tu sādhakaṃ na bhavedityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:926: viśeṣādarśanasya vyabhicārivyāvṛttaviśeṣādarśanasya 4 sarvatra satvādityata śaṅkā sārvatrikī syādityanvayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:927: vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketi vakṣyamāṇodayanavākyaṃ vakṣyamāṇāvdyāghātāvadhitvācchaṅkāyā iti bhaktipādīyachalalakṣaṇoktiprastāvagatasudhāvākyaṃ hradi kṛtvā vyāghātabhiyā evaṃ śaṅkā
GSP29vytrkt3u:931: 1.naiva ta -ṭa.rā. 2.na sarvatra ta- ṭa.ka.ga.rā. 3.na pra-ḍa. 4.sya tatra satvādi-ḍa. sya atra -ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:936: iti nyāyena śaṅkā sārvatrikī syāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:937: kimiyaṃ śaṅkā svārthānumāne syāt parārthānumāne vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:940: evaṃ śaṅkāyāṃ cārvākasya pratyakṣepi karacaraṇādiviśeṣadarśane 'dvaitinopi vedanirdeṣatvajñāne upakramādiliṅganāṃ tātparyāvyabhicārajñāne ca svārthavyabhicāraśaṅkāpātāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:941: śaṅkāviṣakajñānopi svārthasya vyabhicāraśaṅkyā tvadukta 1 vyabhicāraśaṅkāyā eva siddhyāpatteśca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:942: yadi ca tatra tricatura 2 kakṣyānantaraṃ koṭismaraṇādyabhāvānna śaṅkā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:945: tathā ca katipayakakṣyānantaraṃ kutracitkoṭyasmaraṇasya kutracidutkaṭaviṣayāntarasaṃcāras kutracijjijñāsābhāvasya kutracit --“3 yatvādau śraddhayā siddhaṃ punarnyāyena sādhitam”/
GSP29vytrkt3u:946: iti nyāyena svārasikaviśvāsasyā 4 vaśyakatvānna sarvatra śaṅkā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:952: paramukhena samādhiṃ vācayitvā samaṃ prakṛtepītyāha-- yadīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:958: na hi kaścidapi yāvajjīvaṃ koṭismaraṇa 1 dhārāyāmeva vyāpriyamāṇonubhūyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:961: anyathā pratyakṣepi viśeṣadarśanadhārāyāṃ vedepa vedanirdeṣatva 2 jñānadhārāyāṃ ca vyāpriyeta/ uktaṃ hi --
GSP29vytrkt3u:964: iti/ dvitīyepi svārthānumāne śaṅkādhāyakaṃ na tāvtaprativādivākyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:974: viśvāsādinā pramāṇatvena siddhasya śaṅkanāspadatvaṃ jñānapādīyānuvyākhyāne uktamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:979: nanu upajīvyaṃ kathaṃ bādhyamityata āha-- upajīvyatvamastvalamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:998: ata eva paddhatau“soyaṃ kaścitpramāṇāntarānugrāhako bhavatī“ti tarkasya kvacitkatvamevoktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:999_2: sādhakhasabasraṃ nirdeṣatvena tvadabhimate 1 tvadvākye doṣasahasraṃ ca bhaviṣyatītyādyatiprasaṅgahetutvāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:1024: iti / kathaṃ ca pratyakṣasiddhe annādau niḥśaṅkasya pratyakṣasiddhāyāṃ vyāptau śaṅkā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1030: nanu-- pratyakṣa 2 vyāptau śaṅkānudayepyanvayavyāptau sā bhaviṣyati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1031: paricitapratyakṣasthaleṣu hetoḥ sādhyavyabhicārajñānapyatītādau tacchaṅkayā 2 sāsyādevetyata āha-- uktaṃ ceti// yadvā
GSP29vytrkt3u:1032: sannikṛṣṭakatipayadhūmādivyaktivyāptigrahepyatītadivyaktiṣu tadgrahopāyābhāvātkathaṃ sarvatra vyāptigraha ityata āha-- uktaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1033_1: sarvatra satvādityā 3 dinā pūrvapakṣiṇoktaṃ viśeṣādarśanamabhyupetya svārthānumāne
GSP29vytrkt3u:1035: atraiva bhaṅge kiñca vyabhicārivyāvṛttiviśeṣasyādarśana ityādigrantheneti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1042: vācayiṣyate ca paramukhenaiva vyāptidhīkāle vyabhicara 1 vyāvṛttaviśeṣadarśanamapyastīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1044: tatra prati vādinā mayedaṃ sādhyaṃ vyabhicāriṣyatīti sarvatra śaṅkotthāpanāditi dvitīyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1045: 2 tathāpi tṛptyarthaṃ bhojane parabodhanārthaṃ śabdoccāraṇe evaṃ tattatkāryoddeśena tattatkāraṇe ca pravṛttirūpasvakriyāvyāghātena śaṅkānudayāt/ atra --
GSP29vytrkt3u:1047: parārthānumāne veti prāgvikalpitaṃ dvitīpakṣaṃ vivṛṇvanneti nirāha-- nāpīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1049: mayā cārvākeṇa khaṇḍanakāreṇa vā svakriyāvyāghātena vyāghāto virodho hānirvā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1050: yadi sarvatra śaṅkā tvayotthāpyate tarhi bhojanamapi 3 tṛptiṃ vyabhicariṣyati śabdoccāraṇamapi parabodhaṃ vyabhicariṣyatīti bhojanādau na pravṛttiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1053: evaṃ vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketyetadvṛdi kṛtvā vyāghātadaṇḍabhayena sarvatra śaṅkā notpattumarhatītyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1067: vyāghāto hi svakriyāyāḥ śaṅkayā saha virodhaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1071: kālāntare deśāntare vā ayaṃ hetuḥ sādhyaṃ vyabhicāriṣyatīti śaṅkā cedutpannā tadānumānaṃ pramāṇamastyeva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1073: na cedevaṃ śaṅkā tadā sutarāṃ niḥsandehamanumānaṃ pramāṇamastyeva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1074: nanva 3 numānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śaṅkā tu kathaṃ nivartyeti suhṛdbhāvena pṛcchantaṃ pratyāha-- tarkaḥ śaṅkāvadhirmataḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1076: nanu tarkepi vyāpterāvaśyakatvāttatrāpi śaṅkāyāṃ tarkāntarānveṣaṇenavastheti cettatrottaraṃ -- vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1078: yatra śaṅkāyāṃ kriyaṇāyāṃ svakriyāvyāghātādirbhavati tatra na śaṅkotpattumarhatīti tṛtīyaparicchede kusumāḍhjalyuktaślokārthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1087: tathā ca śaṅkā pratiyogitayā vyāghātanirūpakatvena tannirvāhiketi kathaṃ śaṅkāṃ vinā vyāghātaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1089: kimanumānaprāmāṇyepi vyāptiniścayo na saṃbhavatītyucyate na saṃbhavatītyucyate kiṃ vānumānamātramapramāṇamiti/ nādyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1100: evaṃ ca vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketi tarkaḥ śaṅkāvadhiriti ca kuta ityuttarārdhasya svaṣṭatvādartho noktaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1101: vyāptini 1 ścayo na saṃbhavatīti tatsaṃbhavasya tarkādhīnatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1106: nanu tarkādhīnavyāptiniśca 3 hetukaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na prāptamevetyata āha-- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1107: anumānaprāmāṇyaṃ svīkurvatā vyāptiniścaya 4 saṃbhavovaśyaṃ vācyonyathātiprasaṅgāditi bhāvenāha-- vyabhicāriṇāmapīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1109: kaścidapi mama sthāpyaḥ pakṣo neti vadataḥ khaṇḍanakārasyetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1123: anumānasyeva tarkasyāpi vyāptiniścayaṃ vinaiva sādhakhatvasaṃbhāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1124: yadvā tatprāmāṇyanirvāhakopāyāntarābhāvāt asmaduktanirvāhasyaiva tvayāpi vācyatvāttaddūṣaṇoktirayuktetyāha-- vyāptīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1126: paramārthādvaitadṛṣṭyā nāsti samayabandhādivyavahāra ityata āha-- vyāpteriti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1127: yadvā vyāptiniścayo na saṃbhavatītyetatsva 2 vyāhatamityāha-- vyāpteriti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1130: lakṣaṇayādvaitajñānamastu kiṃ śaktigrahaṇenetyata āha-- lakṣaṇāyā iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1143: advaite ṣaḍvidhatātparyaliṅgānāṃ prapañcamithyātvānubhūtasvaprakāśatvādau dṛśya 1 mānatvānubhūtitvādiliṅgānāṃ coktyayogācca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1152: kālānta 3 rādau sādhyaṃ vyabhicariṣyati kimiti śaṅkāspada
GSP29vytrkt3u:1153: ityarthaḥ/ tātvikaprāmāṇyameva dṛśyatvādi hetūnāṃ upeyaṃ tadbodhya 4 mithyātvādestātvikatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:1162: pratyakṣepi netrameva pramāṇaṃ na tu śrotrādi vedepi dvaitavākyameva pramāṇaṃ natvadvaitavākyamiti ca syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1163: etenānumānātsaṃbhāvanāmātreṇa pravṛtyādikaṃ saṃvādācca prāmāṇyābhimāna iti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1164: anumānājjñānaṃ jāyate tacca 1 saṃvādītita vadatā tvayaiva tatpāmāṇyayopagamāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1175: saṃbhāvanamātreṇa pravṛttau sakampaiva pravṛttiḥ syāt na tu niṣkampetayāha-- niṣkampeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1176: nanu mayopetā saṃbhāvanā niṣkampa 4 pravṛttijanikaivetyata āha -- evamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1180: ato na tatra saṃbhāvanāmātropagamena pratyakṣāderaprāmāṇyāpāta ityata āha-- autsargiketi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1189: darśane tu yaddarśane tava saṃbhāvanā taddarśanenaiva mama niścayostu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1190: sa viśeṣaḥ ka iti cedātmānameva pṛccha/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1192: yadi tava samakoṭi 1 śahkāsāmagrīviraho saṃbhāvanā hetuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1194: yadi ca tavānveṣaṇepi vyabhicārādarśanasahakṛtamupādhyadarśanaṃ vā upādhya 2 darśanasaṃbhāvanā vā yāvacchaktiparīkṣā
GSP29vytrkt3u:1197: evaṃ ca yaduktaṃ vyāghāto yadītyādi tadaparāddhoṣerdhānuṣksayeva valgitamātram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1203: paramukhenaiva viśeṣasvarūpaṃ vācayan samaṃ mamāpītyāha -- yadi taveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1205: aparāddhaḥ lakṣyādanyatra gataḥ iṣuḥ śaro yasya tasyetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1211: nahi mayā 1 niṣpanna bhojana 2 kriyā vā kriyāyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ śaṅkayā saha virodho vā tajjñānaṃ vā śaṅkānivartakamityucyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1212: yena kriyāyāṃ satyāṃ śaṅkānivṛtya tṛptikāraṇatvanirṇayaḥ tasmiṃśca sati kriyeti tvaduktonyonyāśrayaḥ tvaduktavirodhi 3 pratiyogiśaṅkāvaśyaṃbhāvaśca 4 syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1213: kintu tvamapi 5 kriyāmūlabhūtena śaṅkāviruddhakoṭyālambana 6 viśeṣadarśanena nivṛttaśaṅkaḥ san manasā vyāptiṃ niścinuṣe/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1216: na hi tatarthaṃ tatra niṣkampaṃ pravartate tacca tatkāraṇaṃ neti śaṅkate ceti saṃbhavati/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3453_1: yajjñānaṃ nirdhūmatvajñānaṃ tadviṣaya 5 tvasya nirdhūmatvāderyo vyatirekaḥ dhūmavatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:3457: 1.siddhāntineti nāsti-ṭa. 2.rābhyu- ga.rā. 3. svasū-ga.rā. 4.pramāpadaṃ na-ṭa.ṭha. 5. yasya-ṭa.ṭha.ḍa. 6.vyāpyasyetyadhikam -- ṭha.

GSP29vytrkt3u:3464: kathamanyathā na cāyaṃ nirdhūmaḥ tasmānna niragnika iti viṣaya 2 viparyavasānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3467: tathātve hi yadīti syāditi ca na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3493: tathātve hi tarhīti syāditi ca na syāt/ kintu 1
GSP29vytrkt3u:3495: na ca nirdhūmoyamiti jñānasya yāvānviṣayastāvāneva tarhi nirdhūmaḥ syādityasyāpi viṣayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3498: sa hi siddhānta viruddhasya sādhane natvāpādane/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3504: tadbhañjaka 2 bhūtaṃ yajjñānaṃ sadhūmatvajñānaṃ tadviṣayo yo vyatirekaḥ sadhūmatvaṃ tatpratiyogitvamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3507: na cāyaṃ nirdhūmaḥ tasmānna niragnika iti viparyaye paryavasānāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3509: nanu nirdhūmatvasādhane kathaṃ na bādha ityata āha-- na cātreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3510: apasiddhāntadoṣaṃ ca prāguktaṃ nirāha-- ata eveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3521: nanvevaṃ 2 bādhāderadoṣatvaṃ kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyamiti cecchṛṣu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3522: sadhūmopi niragnikostviti śaṅgā hi dvedhā sambhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3523: niragnikatvaṃ prati nirdhūmatve vyāpakatvasyaivābhāvena vā satyapi vyāpakatve pakṣe nirdhūmatvasyāpi satvena vā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3533_1: kathaṃ bhramarūpasya ca pramāṇakaraṇatvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ kathamityarthaḥ //

GSP29vytrkt3u:3536_1: tredhā parihāraṃ atra ca niragnikatvamityādinā vivakṣurupoddhātamāha-- śruṇvityāditanā //
GSP29vytrkt3u:3537: tarkaḥ śaṅkāvadhirityuktatvena tasya śaṅkānivartakatvāditi śaṅkā hītyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3541: tatrādyo nirdhūmatvasya vyāpakatvapradarśakena yadi niragnikastarhi nirdhūma ityanena nirasyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3542: yadi gavayo gosadṛśastarhi gaurapi gavayasadṛśī yadi jīvangṛhe nāsti tarhi bahirasti,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3543: yadi dhūmastarhi vahnirityādau yadi tarhyaiḥ svasamabhivyāhṛtapadārthe 'nyathānupapattirūpavyāptibodhakatvasya vyutpattisiddhatvāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3544: ata eva sudhāyāṃ yadīdaṃ tarhīdamityeva vyāptigraha uktaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3551: jīvitve satve gṛhe 'satvamanupapadyamānaṃ bahiḥsatvaṃ kalpayatītyarthāpattipramāṇasyodāharaṇam-- yadi jīvanniti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3553: ādipadena yadi caitramaitrayoranyataratve sati yadyaṃ caitrastarhyanyo maitra ityādigrahaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3557: ityukte sādhanaṃ 1 no kiṃ na hyājñaivātra sādhikā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3558: iti bhaktipādīyānuvyākhyānasudhāyāṃ yadītyeva vyāptigraha ukta ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3572: yadyatithirāgacchettarhi bhojayitavya iti tu viparyaya 2 paryavasānābhāvātsaṃbhāvanāmātraṃ na tu tarka iti tavāpi saṃmatam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3573: atra ca niragnikatvaṃ prati nirdhūmatvasya 3 vyāpakatvaṃ liṅgam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3575: niragnikatvābhāvaṃ prati nirdhūmatvābhāvasya vyāpyatvaṃ liṅgaṃ tajjñānaṃ phalam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3578: tenaiveti// tarhītiśabdayuktena syācchabdena nirdhūmatvasya pakṣe satvamiti pakṣo 'pi nirasta ityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3579: nanvevaṃ tarhi bhojayitavya ityādāvapyaniṣṭa 5 bodhaḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3580: syā 6 tparyāyasya tavyapratyayasya satvādityata āha-- yadyatithiriti//

GSP29vytrkt3u:3598: na tu tvayāśaṅkitaṃ pakṣe niragnikatvajñānam karaṇam/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3608: nanu tāvatā vyāpyatva rūpaliṅgino jñānaṃ prameti kuto vyāpyatvasyāsiddherityata āha -- vyāpakābhāvasyeti//

GSP29vytrkt3u:3618: nirdhūmatvasya ca 1 vyāpakatvapradarśanārthaṃ tarkavākyenopatte ye 2 niragnikatvanirdhūmatvarūpe vyāpyavyāpake tadabhaprāyā//

GSP29vytrkt3u:3640: niragnikatvanirdhūmatvādayaḥ proktāḥ na tu pakṣaniṣṭhatayā proktāḥ/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3654: yakṣasyogratve tadanurodha 1 baliḥ atyugratve atibaliḥ mṛdutve alpabaliriti nyāyenetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3668: nanu -- saṃyogasamavāyābhyāmanyasya kathaṃ pakṣadharma 1 tāghaṭakasaṃbandhatvaṃ kvāpyadarśanādityata āha -- dṛśyate ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3671: ūrdhvadeśo vṛṣṭimān adhodeśe nadīpūra 3 vatvāt ityādirūpānumānasyetyarthaḥ/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3679: nyāyamate śabdo 'bhidheyo jñeyatvādityatra jñeyatvaṃ nāma śabdasya paraṃparāsaṃbandhena jñānatvameva/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3689: 1.tādi gha-ṭa. 2. petya-ṭa.ḍa. 3.ratvā-ṭa. rāditya-ṭha. 4.prameyatvaṃ cetyādikaṃ nāsti -ṭha. 5.ca iti na -ṭa.ṭha.

GSP29vytrkt3u:3717_1: tarka iti sādhanānumāna iva tarkepyasiddhyādikaṃ doṣa eveti na tarkasya sādhanānumānādvaiṣamyamipi //

GSP29vytrkt3u:3733: yatra punaraṅgīkāro vyāpakābhāvasya siddhastādṛśasyaivāsiddhyādiśūnyasya prāmāṇyamupeyata iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3734: nanu yadvetyuktadvitīyapakṣepi parābhyupagamenaivāsiddhyādiparihārāttṛtīyasya tataḥ ko bheda ityata āha-- atra ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3737: nanu tarkepyasiddhyāderdeṣatve tadadoṣatvoktirviruddhetyata āha -- yā tviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3749: yadvā tṛtīyoktāyā abhyupagamāyogyābhyupagamasya liṅgatāyā api sādhanānumāne kvāpyadarśanāt vyavasthoktiḥ pakṣatrayasādhāraṇīti jñeyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3750: etena viparyaya 2 paryavasānarūpānumananirapekṣasya tarkasya na prāmāṇyamiti nibandhādāvudayanādyuktaṃ nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3752: yātu aniṣṭāpādanaṃ viparyaye paryavasānaṃ cobhayaṃ militemevānumitisādhanaṃ bhavatīti tarkasya prāmāṇyamiti paddhatiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3755: ata ityādi granthakāravākyam svasiddhe 3 rityādi vākyadvayā 4 bhiprāya vivaraṇam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3764: evaṃ hi paddhativirodha ityato dvedhā samādhimāha-- yātviti//

GSP29vytrkt3u:3800: kiñca 2 pramātvenānāśaṅkite dhūmarūpaviśeṣyasya 3 sākṣātkāre sati kathaṃ nirdhūmatvasyāropaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3801: na ca tarkasya pratimāyāṃ nārāyaṇabuddhivadāhāryāroparūpatvādviśeṣadarśanaṃ na virodhīti vācyam/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3808: na kevalamatiprasaṅgabhayāttarkasyābhramatvamupeyaṃ kiṃ tu viśeṣadarśanarūpavirodhisatvepyu 5 papannatvānna bhramatvaṃ tasyopetuṃ śakyamityāha --
GSP29vytrkt3u:3812: kintvasmaduktadiśā pramārūpa eva vācya iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3827: tarkaḥ saṃdehaviparyayapramāvijātīyaṃ jñānāntaraṃ sāca jātiḥ tarkayāmi na tu niścinomi ityanuvyavasāyasākṣiketi maṇikaṇṭhoktaṃ ca nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3829: kiñca tarkatvasya jātitve tarkasya tvadaṅgīkṛtaṃ saṃśayanivartakatvaṃ na syāt/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3842: nanu tarkarūpajñānasya jātyaiva saṃśayanivartakatvamastviti vaktāraṃ pratyāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3843_0: nanu -- jātyaiva nivartakatvepi maṇyādikaṃ jātyā pratibandhakamapi yathā dāhasyaiva

GSP29vytrkt3u:3849: tatroddeśa 1 dāhatvasyevātra śaṅkātvasyaiva pratibadhyatāvacchedakatvaṃ 2 ceduktāti prasaṅgāt/ tarkaviṣa 3

GSP29vytrkt3u:3868: 1.śya- ka.ga.rā. 2.tve uktā -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.yaka -ga.rā. punarviṣayetyadhikam -ka. 4. sya ca -ga.ṭa.rā. 5. vyāghātatvādi- ga.ṭa.rār. 6.kajñānaṃ pra-ga.ṭa.rā.
GSP29vytrkt3u:3877: pakṣādanyatra niyamepi pakṣe samabalasya prabalasya vā sādhyābhāvapramāṇasyābhimānena pakṣa eva sadhūmo niragnikostviti vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3878: tatrādyā vyabhicāraśaṅkārūpā liṅgaparāmarśātprācīnā dvitīyā tu pratipramāṇaśaṅkārūpā tasmādarvācīnā//

GSP29vytrkt3u:3893: bahuśaḥ sahacaritayorapi yatkiñcivdyabhicāradarśanaṃ tena nimittenātrāpi dhūmādau tatheti jñāyamānetyarthaḥ/

GSP29vytrkt3u:3943: tataḥ 'karaṇaśarīra' ityādikañcāsta -ka.ṭa.rā. 3.ṇasyānugrāhako bhavati--apiśabdāttataḥprāk vyabhicāra śaṅkānirasanadvāreṇa śarīraniṣpadakaśca(na)
GSP29vytrkt3u:3952: yadvā kvacivdyabhicārasya pratipramāṇasya vā śaṅkāyāmanugrāhakaḥ karaṇaniṣpādanena vā 2 niṣpannasya 3 karaṇasya sarakāritayā vopakārako bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3977: adriragnimānna veti vipratipattau sādhanānumānaṃ vinaiva yadi niragnikaḥ syāttarhi nirdhūmaḥ syān cāyaṃ nirdhūma iti tarkarūpānumānenaivāgnisiddheḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3978: na hi vidhimukhena sādhayitvaiva niṣedhamukhena sādhanīyamiti kuladharma ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3981: yadvā kvaciduddeśyāyāṃ tasmānna niragnika iti pramāyāṃ sādhyāyāmanugrāhako bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3982: apiśabdānnirdhūmatvenāṅgīkartavya iti pramāyāṃ vā 1 vyāptipramāyāṃ vā sādhyāyāṃ svatantraśca bhavatītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3987: nanvagnimāndhūmavatvāditi vidhimukhenāsādhayitvā kataṃ niṣedhamukhenaiva sādhanamityata āha-- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3997: 1.ādau 'vyāptipramāyāṃ vā' ityasti-ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 2.kyasyetiyojyam uktaṃ ce -ṭa.ṭha. syeti bhāvaḥ -ḍa. 3.'yāṃ' iti,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3998: tataḥ anugrāhaka ityādikamevāsti -ṭha. 4.yetyādivākyavyākhyāvasare -ṭa. śraya ityādivā-ḍa. 5.'aṅgīkartavya iti' ityasti -ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:4004: sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vā pramāṇameva hi śaṅkānivartakam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4007: hi vyāptiyogyatādibhramajanyānumitiśābdajñānadiriva dhārāvāhikabhrame dvitīyānugṛhītasya prathamasyeva vā 1 pramāṇatarkānugṛhītānumiterevāpramātvaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4011: nanu dhūmavatvādisādhanāphalabhūtāgnimatvādipramāmeva paryavasānamukhena janayastarkasya kathaṃ prāmāṇyamityāśaṅkāṃ sadṛṣṭāntaṃ pariharannupasaṃharati -- tasmāditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4013: tathātve 'nugrāhakatvameva na syādityāśaṅkāṃ sadṛṣṭāntaṃ 2 nirasyannupasaṃharati -- tasmāditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4015: śaṅkānivartakatvānyathānupapatyā ca tarkasya prāmāṇyamityāha -- sādhakaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4025: kiñca paramate tarkasya kiṃ viṣaya 1 viśodhana upayogaḥ kiṃ vā vyāptigrahe,
GSP29vytrkt3u:4027: kiṃ vā vardhamānarītyā sādhyābhāvasaṃdehanivartanena yadvā tajjanyasādhyābhāvajijñāsānivartanena,
GSP29vytrkt3u:4041: tatra ca tarkasyāprāmāṇyepi na doṣa ityatastaduktopayogaṃ khaṇḍayitumāha -- kiṃñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4042: vyāptigrāhakasya viṣayapariśodhakasya veti parāmarśavādānte maṇyukterāha -- kiṃ viṣayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4051: kiñca vahnivyapte 1 dhūme dṛṣṭe kathaṃ vahnyāvasaṃdehaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4052: na ca viśeṣadarśane sati svārasikasya vahnyabhāvasaṃdehasyāsaṃbhavepi pratipramāṇāhitā tacchaṅkā yakteti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4059: nirdhūmatvasyāyogolakādāviva sāgnikatvepi hṛdādāviva niragnikatvepi sambhavāt sādhāraṇyenetyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4060: bhavanmatepi tarhi nirdhūmatvajñānācchaṅkānivṛttirna syādityata āha-- manmatetviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4063: pratyuta tvanmata eva tannivṛttirayukteti bhāvenāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4077: anyathā prameyatvādiprakārakamapi viṣā 1 dijñānaṃ tannivartakaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4078: na ca nirdhūmatvajñānaṃ tvanmate nirdhūmatāṃ tadāpādakatvenāniṣṭaṃ niragnitāṃ vāniṣṭa 2 prāmāṇyāpātāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4079: kiṃ tu pakṣaniṣṭhatayaiveti kathaṃ tarkeṇa niragnikatvajijñānasānivṛttiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4081: pratipramāṇaṃ-- sādhyābhāvaviṣayaṃ tarkajñānaṃ tu nirdhūmatvaviṣayamiti virodhiviṣayakatvaṃ neti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4082: sādhyābhāvajijñāsānivartaneneti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- na tṛtīya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4084: nirdhūmatvajñānena jijñāsānivṛttau nivṛttiprayojakadharmābhāvānna sāmarthyamiti sāmānyanyāyoktipūrvamāha-- jñānasya hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4086: astvetadapi jñānaṃ tathetyata āha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4091: aniṣṭamaniṣṭatā 6 vacchedakenollekhe sati vahnitvādinā vahnyādyullekhijñānasyeva prāmāṇyaṃ syādityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4092: nanu dhūmaṃ paśyataḥ kathaṃ nirdhūmatvādijñāne pramāṇaviruddhatvādikaṃ na bhāyāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4099: kiñca pramāṇaviruddhanirdhūmatvāpādakatayā niragnikatvamevāniṣṭaṃ na tu tajjñānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4101: tathā ca niragnikatvaviṣayecchāyā eva nivṛttiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4104: āptavākyādinā svasya dāridrayaṃ niścitavatopi dhena autkaṇṭhyadarśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4107: cedevamapi nirdhūmanatvajñānena niragnikatvecchaiva nivartyā natu tajjñānecchārūpā jijñāsetyāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4118: yena nirdhūmatvamaprāmāṇikamiti niragnikatvaṃ ca tadāpādakamityubhayamaniṣṭaṃ syādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4136: duḥkhaṃ tatsādhanaṃ vā yathāniṣṭamucyate tathā 2 prāmāṇike tadāpadake vāṅgīkārānarhatvamātreṇāniṣṭapadamastīti śabdasāmyamātreṇetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4138: sādhyābhāvajijñāsā tu na pratibandhaketi tannirāsāyāso vyartha evetyāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4148: 1. va viṣayajñānenāpi -- ṭa. be jñānamiti jñānenā-rā. 2.thā a -ḍa. 3.ata evetyadhikam -ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:4154: etena vyāptigrahe upayoga iti dvitīyopi nirastaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4155: nirdhūmatvajñānasya viṣayakṛtavirodhābhāvādāropa 1 tvena jñātatvācca niragnikostviti śaṅkāṃ pratyavirodhitvāditi dik//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4159: sādhyābhāvasaṃśayajanyasādhyajijñāsojjīvakatvena tarkasyopayoga iti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- nāpi caturtha iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4164: na ca nirdhūmatvajñānaṃ sādhyābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyavirodhiviṣayakaṃ yena vyāptigrahopayogi syāditi bhāvenāha -- nirdhūmatvajñānasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4165: kiñca tvanmate kevalānvayisādhyakahetuprayogasthale sādhyābhāvāprasiddhyā māstu prameyatvamityādiśaṅkānudayena tatra tannivartanāsaṃbhavātkathaṃ tatra tarkasyopayogaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4166: api ca tarkasyāpi vyāptisāpekṣatvena tarkāṅgavyāptijñānepi tarkāpekṣāyāmanavasthāpātena na vyāptigrahopayogitvaṃ tarkasya syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4167: yadi kvacittarkeṇa vināpi vyāptigrahastarhi vyabhicārātkathaṃ tarkasya tadupayogitvam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4176: atra viparītaśabdena paramate svamata iva nivartyāyāḥ śaṅkāyā nivartakena tarkeṇa saha viṣayakṛto virodho neti darśitam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4180: anyathopapatyanyathānupapattirūpaviruddhaviṣayakatvaṃ yathā svamate tathā na paramata ityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4189: yattu paddhatau kevalānvayikevalavyatirekītyādinā paroktānumānatraividhyamanūdya nirastaṃ tadvivaritukāmaḥ taccānumānaṃ trividhamityādināmaṇyuktaṃ nirasitumāha --yacceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4209: bhāvābhāvayoranyonyaviraharūpatayā gaganātyantābhāvopi gaganarūpātyantābhāvapratiyogīti tatrāvyāptaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syādato vṛttimaditi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4210: gaganaṃ cāvṛttipadārthastanmata iti vṛttimadatyantābhāvo na gaganarūpaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4229: tvanmate vyāptigrahārthaṃ pratijñāvākyasyābodhakatvaparihārārthaṃ ca 1 viśiṣṭajñānaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvakamiti niyamārthaṃ 2 sādhyaprasiddherāvaśyakatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4234: yasya dharmasya kevalaṃ vyatireko abhāva eva prasiddhaḥ na tu bhāvaḥ sa dharmaḥ kevalavyatirekīti tādṛśadharmasādhyakamanumānamapi kevalavyatirekyanumānamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4240: vyatirekihetunotpannasādhyaviśeṣaṇa 5 kapakṣaviśeṣyakaviśiṣṭajñānamanumiteḥ pūrvaṃ sādhyāprasiddhau viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvakaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4241: tathā ca tatpūrvakatvaniyamaśca nirvikalpakajñānavādinā tvayāṅgīkṛta iti tadrakṣārthaṃ sādhyaprasiddhirāvaśyakītyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4243: 1. ca iti nāsti- ṭa.rā. 2.ca ityadhikam-ṭa.rā. 3.kyapīti-ṭa. kyanumānamapīti -ṭha. 4.ṇyarū -ḍa. 5. ṇapa - ṭa.ḍa.
GSP29vytrkt3u:4250: nāpi pakṣaikadeśe tena nāsādhāraṇyam pakṣādanyatra tadaprasiddheḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:4251: nāpi kevalavyatirekavaiyarthyam tasya kṛtsne pakṣe sādhyapratītyarthatvāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4252: pṛthivītarabhinne 4 tyādau pakṣasyaikadeśasatvepi gaganamitara 5 bhinnamityādau tadabhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4257: kathamabhāva ityato bhaktipāde sādhyāprasiddhajheradoṣatvoktiprastāve sudhoktarītyāha-- tatreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4259: vyatirekavāde maṇau siddhānte kathitaṃ nirāha-- nāpīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4266: nanu pakṣādanyatra niścitasādhyakatvameva dṛṣṭāntatve prayojakamityata āha -- pakṣeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4267: nanvastūktadiśā vyatirekiṇonvayitvaṃ tathāpi na kevalavyatirekitvabhaṅga ityāśaṅkya pratyāhahaha -- na cānvayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4278: naca yatrānitye vāṅmanase ityādau pakṣatāvacchedakanānātvaṃ tatraivāṃśe siddhasādhanam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4287: atraivottaratra kiñcābhāvagatayā vyatirekavyāptyā kathaṃ bhāvasya gamakatvamityādineti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4288: maṇyādyuktamevāṃśataḥ siddhasādhanatādoṣoddhāramāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ca yatreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4299: na ca ghaṭasya ghaṭatvenetarabhedaniścayepi pṛthivītvena tatsaṃdehādikamiti 1 vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4301: anyathaitatparvatatvena vahnimattayā niścaye 2 pi parvate parvatatvena tatsaṃdehāpatyā tatra vahnyarthino niṣkampapravṛttirna syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4310: jñānayoḥ samānaprakārakatvenaiva nivartyanivartakabhāva iti nyāyasya sāmānyaviśeṣaprakārānyaparatvamiti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4311_1: maṇāvanūdya nirastamapi maṇyuktadoṣe tavdyākhyātṛṇāṃ vivādabhāvātsvayaṃ dṛḍhadoṣavivakṣayā
GSP29vytrkt3u:4319: evaṃ ca nānvayitvādikam pakṣaikadeśepi sādhyāniścayāt nāpyasādhāraṇyam sapakṣābhāvāt nāpi vyatirekivaiyarthyam tasya niścayārthatvāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4321: na ca tejobhinnā pṛthivī jalādidvādaśabhinnā na veti tejobhinnadharmikajalādidvādaśabhinnatvakoṭikasaṃśayenārthāstrayodaśābhinnatvarūpasādhyaprasi ddhiryukteti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4324: śaśīyakarṇādau śaśīyamidaṃ śṛṅgaṃ na veti saṃdehena śaśaśraṅgasyāpi prasiddhiprasaṅgācca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4327: pṛthivī tejobhinnā na veti saṃśayena pṛthivyāmeva vā prasiddhaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4329: evaṃ ca tatraikaṃ pakṣabhūtadharmiviśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtvānyakoṭikasaṃśayotpādi kimapi na bādhakamityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca tejobhinneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4331: tathā ca yatra na saṃdehastatrāprasiddhirdurvāroti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4332: nanu saṃdigdhe nyāyapravṛtteḥ saṃśayaḥ sārvatrika iti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4339: tathā ca tādṛśaṃ prati niścayarūpasādhyaprasiddhireva vācyeti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4346: na ca tarhi pakṣādanyatraiva trayodaśasu trayodaṣabhedānāṃ viśakalitānāṃ niścayarūpā prasiddhirastīti nāprasaddhaviśeṣaṇatvādīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4354: athavetyādinā maṇyuktaṃ pakṣāntaramāśaṅkya nirāha -- na catarhīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4361: yadvā trayodasapadārthānāmanyonyābhāvānāṃ jalabhedastejasi tejobhedo jale ityevaṃrūpeṇa prasiddhirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4366: ityadhikam-ga. 'śaśaśṛṅgollikhitā bhūrityādāvapi viśakalitānāṃ prasiddheḥ suvacatvāt' ityasti -ṭa. 2. sādhyateti iti na -ṭa.ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:4371: kiñcaikenaiva liṅgenaikadā sādhyamānā api 1 trayodaśabhedāḥ pratyekanirūpitatrayogaśavyāptibhireva sādhanīyāḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4375: yatra trayodaśānāmanyonyābhāvanāmabhāvastatra pṛthivītvābhāva iti hi vyatirekavyāptirjalādau pradarśanīyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4376: tatra jale jalānyonyābhāvābhāvasya satveti tejaḥpṛbhṛtipratiyogikānāṃ dvādaśabhedānāmabhāvasyāsatvena sādhyābhāvasyābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4381: nanu -- yanmate tādṛśābhāvasvīkārastanmatarītyāyaṃ pakṣe maṇavukta iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4394: tathā ca pratyekameva sādhyatā viśrāntetyekaikabhedarūpasādhyavato jalādereva sapakṣatvena tato vyāvṛttatvena 1 hetorasādhāraṇyatādavasthyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4405: pratyekābhāvānāṃ pratyekanirūpitānvayavyāptibhireva tāvatāṃ bhedānāṃ sādhyatvāditi bhāvenāyaṃ granthaḥ pṛtta iti yathānyāsa eva granthaḥ sādhuriti 4 jñeyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4409: anumitiviṣayavato vyāvṛttatvameva pṛthivītvahetorastvityata āha-- na ca prakṛta iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4427: jalādau svasmādbhedābhāvepi teja ādidvādaśabhedānāṃ satvena trayodaśabhedābhāvarūpasādhyavyatirekagābhāvena vyatirekavyāptigrahānupapatteśca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4428: nanu ghaṭasya satvepipaṭābhāvena ghaṭapaṭau na sta itivajjale dvādaśabhedeṣu satsvapi jalādbhedābhāvena vyāsajyavṛttipratiyogitākatrayodaśabhedābhāvostīti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4438: pṛthivyā jalātmakatve satyapi teja ādyanātmakatvamātreṇa trayodaśānyonyābhāvopapattyārthāntarāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4439: laghavena pratiyogisatvamātramabhāvavirodhī 1 ti vadatā tvayaiva vyāsajyavṛtti 2 pratiyogikābhāvānaṅgīkārācca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4440: ghaṭe satyapi ghaṭapaṭau nasta iti dhīstu ghaṭe paṭasāhityābhāvaviṣayeti tvayevaiktam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4443: vyāsajyavṛttiḥ anugatavṛttimānyaḥ tādṛśadharmāvacchinnā pratiyogitā yasya tādṛśo yastrayodaśabhedānāmabhāva ityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4447: ato na tādṛśo 'bhāvo 'ṅgīkartṛṃ śakya iti prāguktavyāptigrahānupapattiḥ sustheti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4458_0: 1.ghaṭe satyapi ghaṭapaṭau nasta iti dhīstu ghaṭapaṭasāhityabhāva viṣayeti vadatātvayaiva
GSP29vytrkt3u:4463: na cāsādhāraṇyasya satpratipakṣavadvipakṣe bādhakābhāvadaśāyāmeva doṣatvātprakṛte ca vipakṣe bādhakasya satvā 1 ttasyādoṣatvamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4466: te ca pakṣaikadeśe ghaṭādau militā vā pakṣādanyatra
GSP29vytrkt3u:4467: viśakalitā vā ghaṭādau jalatvaṃ 3 netyādipratyakṣeṇa siddhā iti nistam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4474: tathāpi trayāṇāṃ madhye dvayame 4 kīkṛtya dvitvasaṃpādanenānyataraditi sādhviti dhyeyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4479: pratyekaṃ trayodaśābhāvānāṃ sādhyatvenābhimatānāṃ jalāditrayodaśasu prasiddhatvena teṣāmeva sapakṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4480: yopi maṇāvanyotvityādinā tattadasādhāraṇadharmātyantābhāvāḥ sādhyā ityantābhāvasādhyakapakṣa uktaḥ tamapi nirāha -- eteneti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4485: 1.tvānna tasya doṣatvabhi-ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 2.kṣasya sa -ṭa.rā. 3.tvādi-ṭa. 4.mekarāśī -ṭha.ḍa. 5.prakṛte ceti iti na -ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:4489_1: vā vyāghātadaṇḍabhayena vā sāmānyataḥ 2 prasiddhaṃ trayodaśabhinnatvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sādhyate /
GSP29vytrkt3u:4494: pratyekamevātyantābhāvānāṃ sādhyatvātteṣāṃ ca pratyekaṃ jalādāveva prasiddhestatra ca hetoravṛtteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4496: yadapi maṇau“yadvā jalaṃ tejaḥ prabhṛtidvādaśabhinnapratiyogikānyonyābhāvavadityā“dinā sāmānyataḥ 4 prasaddhisaṃpādakamanumuktam tadapyāśaṅkya nirāha -- nanu tarhītyādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4497_0: yadyapi maṇāvanyathaiva sādhyanirdeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ tathāpi tatra yathāśrute tejaḥprabhṛtidvādaśanirūpitabhedādhikaraṇe
GSP29vytrkt3u:4499: tejaḥprabhṛtayo ye dvādaśapadārthāstadvibhinnaṃ yadvastu tanniṣṭho yo bhedastatpratiyogīti sādhyārthaḥ/

GSP29vytrkt3u:6628: sthalāntarepi vyadhikaraṇasya gamakatvaṃ paramate darśayati-- kiṃ ca tvanmata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6631: astu kiṃ tata ityata āha - tathā ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6639: śabdasya pramāyāḥ svarūpasaṃbandhaḥ pramayā pramātvasya samavāya iti paramparetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6641: lohitaḥsphaṭika“ityādāviva paramparāsaṃbandhenāpi taddharmatvaṃ kalpyaṃ na hi tathā dhīrityāha -- śabda iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6652: na ca pramājātīyaviṣayatvaṃ vā īśvarapramāviṣayatvaṃ vā prameyatvaṃ tacca śabde 'stīti vācyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6655: kiñca vyatirakevyāptiḥ sākṣādaṅgamiti tvanmate vyāptipakṣadharmatayorvaiyadhikaraṇyepi gamatvavat sādhyasādhanayorapi vayaidhikaraṇye 'pi gamyagamakatāstu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6657: api ca dhūmajātīyasya vahnijātīyaṃ prativyāpyatvātparvatīyo dhūmo mahānasīvayavahniṃ pratyapi vyāpya ititvanmate kathaṃ vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6660: pratibandyāpi vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ na doṣāyetyā 1 ha-- kiñca vyatireketi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6672: vyāptivighaṭanādvā doṣatvamiti pakṣaṃ nirāha -- na tṛtīya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6691: evaṃ nirdeśo pañcatvaparigaṇane ca mūlamāha-- taduktamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6694: sādhyasamapadena cāsiddhiḥ atī kālapadena bādha ityuktārthasaṃvāditvaṃ dhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6695: maṇyādyuktadiśā teṣāṃ lakṣaṇānyanuvadati-- tatra teṣumadhya ityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6697: tadubhayopasthitijanakaṃ yadrūpaṃ sādhāraṇe sapakṣavipakṣavṛttitvena sādhyatadabhāvasāhacaryaṃ asādhāraṇe tadubhayavyāvṛttatvaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:6698: anupasaṃhāriṇi ca tadubhayaśūnyatvena pakṣa eva sādhyatadabhāvasāhacaryamityagre vyaktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6703_1: anyathā sarvasamabhidheyaṃ vsatutvādityādau kevalānvayisādhyakānupasaṃhāriṇi sādhyābhāvakoṭeraprasiddhera 2 vyāptiḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:6705: kevalānvayisādhyake idamabhidheyaṃ na vetyevaṃ sandehā 3 yoge 'pi abhidheyatvaṃ pakṣavṛttina vetyevaṃ saṃśayasaṃbhavāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6706: vyāptiniścayavirodhisaṃśayaśca sādhyatadabhāvasaṃśayaḥ sādhye pakṣavṛttitvasaṃśayaśca bhavatīti kathanaṃ tattu maṇivākyaviruddham/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6712: vatvaṃ savyabhicāratvaṃ vipratipattivākye satpratipakṣe ca dvayoḥ koṭidvayopasthāpa'katvepi
GSP29vytrkt3u:6721_1: śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāditi satpratipakṣe cātivyāptirevetyata
GSP29vytrkt3u:6722: vipratipattistu pratyekaṃ na tatheti pūrvapakṣa 3 maṇyukteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6723: tathāsādhāraṇagranthe satpratikṣeddhau atra tveka eveti cokteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6724: yadyapi vimataṃ mithyā dṛśyatvāt śuktirajatavat vimataṃ satyaṃ dṛśyatvādbrahmavadityādiprakaraṇasamepyekasyaivobhayopasthāpakatvamasti,
GSP29vytrkt3u:6726: tasyāpi savyabhicāratvena saṅgra 5 hyatvādadoṣa iti kecit//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6738: mātrapadena sapakṣavṛttitvaṃ vyāvartyete na tu pakṣavṛttitvamapi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6741: vṛkṣaḥ saṃyogavān dravyatvādityatra dravyatvahetoḥ sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitve 'pi niścitasaṃyogarūpasādhyavalatyapi vṛtterna tatrātivyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6743: yattu maṇau sādhyavyāpakābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ vā vṛttimataḥ sādhyavadavṛttitvaṃ vā viruddhatvamityādi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6746: niścitasādhyavadavṛttitve sati tadabhāvavadvṛttitvasya cāvyabhicaritasahacārarūpavyāptyabhāvarūpatayā tajjñānas vyāptijñānapratibandhadvārānumitipratibandhya sambhavāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6767: pakṣadharmatāpramitiḥ siddhiḥ tadrahitosiddha iti prācāṃ rītimāśritya lakṣaṇaṭīkoktaṃ niṣkṛṣyāha -- parāmarśeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6769: yattu maṇau parāmarśaviṣayābhāvo nāsiddhaḥ vyarthaviśaṣaṇatvāt kiṃ tu āśrayāsiddhiḥ svarūpāsiddhiḥ vyāpyatvāsiddhiriti pratyekameva doṣa ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6794: 1 tanna śabdo nityo meyatvāditi sādhāraṇasya sarvamanityaṃ prameyatvādityanupasaṃhāriṇaśca sādhyatadabhāvasāhacaryaṃ koṭidvayopasthāpakaṃ rūpam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6795: iyāṃstu bhedaḥ sādhāraṇasya pakṣādanyatra tatsāhacaryaṃ anupasaṃhāriṇastu pakṣa eveti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6796: anityaḥ śabdaḥ śabdatvāditya 2 sādhāraṇasya tu sādhyavataḥ tadabhāvavataśca vyāvṛttatvaṃ tadupasthāpakamiti savyabhicāralakṣaṇasya 3 nātivyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6800: yathā sarvamanityaṃ meyatvādityādiprācīnamatāvaṣṭambhena paddhatyādyuktadiśā'ha -- bhedo draṣṭavya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6802: granthagauravabhayāt prakṛte vakṣyamāṇāntarbhāvānuprayogācca nāsmābhirapi likhyate savyabhicārādilakṣaṇaṃ sādhāraṇāditraye 'siddhitraye ca vyanakti - tatra śabda ityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6830_0: tvaduktarītyā pāñcavidhyasambhavepi tena rūpeṇa jñātānāṃ teṣāmanumityapratibandhakatayā
GSP29vytrkt3u:6833: 1.rā kathamapi bodhonumiti -ka. rātatrāpyanu - ṭa. 2.yapramātvena -ga.ṭa.rā. 3. viṣayeti nāsti -ka.ṭa.
GSP29vytrkt3u:6838: tadasat yadrūpeṇa hi jñānamanumitipratibandhakaṃ tadrūpeṇaiva doṣaḥ paraṃ pratyudbhāvanīyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6840: yadrūpeṇa ca tatsādhanaṃ tadrūpeṇaiva hetvābhāsādidoṣo vibhajanīyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6854: anyajñānaṃ pratibandhakamanyadudbhāvyaṃ tatonyadasādhakatāsādhākaṃ tadanyasya vibhāga iti vairūpyāpātādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6858: nanvasādhakatāyāmanupayoginopi sambhavamātreṇa vibhagasyoktau ko doṣa ityata āha -- saṃbhavatopīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6860: tathā ca teṣāmapi parigaṇanāpātena pañcaivetyuktirayukteti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6867: na tu bādhatvādinā bādhitatvātprati 2 ruddhatvādityasya hi prabalasamabalapramāṇaviruddhatvādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6870: astvevaṃ yena rūpeṇa jñānamityādinoktaṃ prakṛte kiyityataḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:6874: kuta ityataḥ 3 vahniranuṣṇaḥ padārthatvādityādau vādinokte prativādinā padārthatvāditi hetuḥ asādhakaḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:6875: bādhitatvātsatpratipakṣatvādityucyate sati vādinā vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvadūṣaṇaṃ vaktumāpādyata ityāha -- bādhitatvā 4 pratiruddhatvādityasya hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6876_1: yadvākye prativādyuktadūṣaṇāvagatiḥ sa nigṛhīta iti samayabandhena kathāpravṛttau
GSP29vytrkt3u:6894: na ca bādhapratirodhayoranyamasaṅkarārthaṃ tadupādānam dūṣakatābījaikyena saṅkarasyaivocitatvāt -
GSP29vytrkt3u:6896: tasya dūṣaṇasya liṅgatvajñānam pratibandhakatvavadanenāpi tvasambhava ityabhiprāyeṇa vāsādhakatāsādhanamiti maṇāvevoktatvāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6897: durbalapramāṇavirodhasya akiñcitkaratvenāsādhakatvāsādhakatayā tadvyāvṛttaye prabaletyādyarthavadityata āha -- dūrbalasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6898: durbalaṃ hi hīnabalatvādevāpramāṇatvena nirṇītamiti pramāṇapadaprayoga eva tatra na yukta iti tena tadvyāvṛttirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6899: nanu kathaṃ tarhi satpratipakṣasthale vastuto hīnabale samabalatayābhimanyāne pramāṇapadaprayoga ityata āha-- pramāṇeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6905: tathā caikamevedaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāditi pañceti vibhāgabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6918: kiñca bādhitenāpi tvāmahaṃ jetuṃ śakta iti
GSP29vytrkt3u:6920: nanu sambhavamātreṇa tathā prayoge ko doṣa ityata āha-- vyāvartyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6929: aśaktijñāpanamātreṇa parāpajayasya svajayasya ca saṃbhavena tanmātrasyaivoddeśyenātiśayi 2 tāśaktijñāpanasyānuddeśyatayā tādarthyena sārthakyoktirayuktā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6931: atiśayenāśaktijñāpanasya lābhe kutaḥ parityājya ityata āha-- bādhājñāneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6932: nanu prabalamapi na jānāmi kimu samabalamityastu kaścitatiśaya iti manvānaṃ pratyāha -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6940: bhāvenedaṃ prayuktamityapi suvacatvātparasya śaktyatiśaya eva kiṃ na sidhyet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6942: kiñca bādhepi pramāṇapadenaiva prabala 1 tvepi labdhe prabalapadaṃ 2 vyartham/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6954: prabalapadaṃ vyarthamityeva na kintu viruddhārthakatvācca nopadeyamasādhakatvānumāna 4 mityāha -- kiñca bādhepīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6956_0: nanu samabalavyāvṛtyarthakasya na hānikaratvena viparītaphalatvaṃ bādhasya svapakṣasthāpanāparapakṣapratikṣepalakṣaṇādviruddhirūpatvāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:6964: bandha evoddeśya iti yāvatāpratibandhasiddhistāvadeva vaktavyam/ na tvanyat//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6965: kiñcaivaṃ parasyātitarāmaśaktijñāpanāya bahutvopajīvyatvaniravakāśatvaiḥ prabalapramāṇaviruddhatvāditi bādhitatve sati savyabhicāritvādityādyapi prayujyeta/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6967: vāde vādaprakriyayā pravṛtte śāstre cātiheyatvavyutpādanāya bahudoṣoktiryuktā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:6972: nanu kathaṃ tarhi vādakathāyāṃ śāstre cānekadoṣaḥ paroktānumāneṣu pradarśyate tatrāpyādhikyanigrahasthānāpattirityata āha
GSP29vytrkt3u:6975: yāvatsphurati dvayaṃ trayaṃ tato 'dhikaṃ vā tāvatsarvaṃ vācyamiti samayabandhe sati tadanuktau doṣābhāvādityatāha -- samayabandhaṃ vineti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6984: virodhijñānadvayasannipāte ekatra pramātvaniścayasya karaṇaprābalyaniścayaṃ vināpyupapatyā'vaśyakasya prabalapramāṇavirodhasyaiva doṣatvaucityācca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6985: kiñca pratirodhe kḷptatvena bādhopi karaṇavirodhasyaiva doṣatvaṃ yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6986: kiṃ ca pratirodha iva bādhe 'pi āvaśyakenāhīnabalatvenaiva pratibandhasaṃbhave kiṃ pramātvaviśeṣaṇena/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6990: tathā ca prabalapramāṇavirodha eva bādho vācyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6996: pratirodhe satpratipakṣe evamapi 2 vaiyarthyamevāsmin pakṣe prabhavatyevetyāha -- kiñca pratirodha
GSP29vytrkt3u:6997: iveti// pratirodhepi samabaletya ya vyarthatvādinā 3 balatvena viśeṣaṇa viśeṣaṇatya prāgupapādānāt pratirodha ivetyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7000: ahīnabalapramāṇavirodhatvena vā ahīnabalasādhakavirodhatvena vā ahīnabalāvagatasādhyābhāvavatpakṣakatvena vā pratibandhasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7002: 1. sya na bādhakatvayo -ka. 2.pi vyarthame- ṭa.ḍa. 3.nāhīna - ṭa.ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:7006: kiñcaivaṃ vahniḥ śītaḥ kṛtakatvādityatra vahniruṣṇa iti pramābādho na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7010_2: vā bādha ityapi nirvaktuṃ śakyatvādbādho nānā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:7013: pramitasādhyābhāvavatpakṣakatvaṃ bādha iti lakṣaṇe 'vyāptiṃ cāha-- kiñcaivamati//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7020: tathā ca pratipakṣopyevameveti bādhapratipakṣayorekadūṣaṇatvameva praptamiti pañceti vibhāgabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7023: astu 2 nāma ko doṣa ityata āha-- atra ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7043: nanūktarūpāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ madhye dvayaṃ liṅgarūpam ekaṃ tu liṅgibhūtam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7044: tatra tābhyāṃ liṅgābhyāmanumitimekaṃ bādhatvena dūṣaṇamastviti cet kiṃ liṅgaṃ kiṃ liṅgīti nirdhārakapramāṇābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7047: sarvaṃ veti pakṣe hetvabhāsādhikyamiti pañcamyodhikahetvābhāsagaṇanāpāta ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7057: pratyakṣaśabdābhyāṃ śabdasya ca samabalābhyāṃ śabdapratyakṣābhyāṃ pratirodhe 'vyāpteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7059: tasmādbādhapratirodhayoḥ pratijñārthapramāṇavirodhatvenaiva doṣatvaṃ na tu prabalapramāṇavirodhatvādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7060: ata eva bhagavatpādaiḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇe pramāṇaviruddhārthapratijñā pratijñāvirodha iti
GSP29vytrkt3u:7061_1: doṣatvamuktvā asiddhiravyāptiriti hetuvirodhaḥ sādhyasya sādhanasya vānanugamo dṛṣṭāntavirodha
GSP29vytrkt3u:7062: yā tu paddhatau pramāṇaviradhopi dvedhā prabalapramāṇavirodhaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:7071: pramāṇavi 1 ruddhtavenaikīkaraṇe 3 pramāṇapaddhativirodhamāśaṅkya tadabhiprāyoktyā nirāha-- yā tviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7078: dvaividhyoktiḥ sā pratyakṣādivirodhabhedena dvāvapi pratyekaṃ trividhāviti traividhyoktiḥ śichaṣyamativaiśadyāya vastusthitipradarśanārthaṃ vā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:7079: prativādino viśeṣajijñāsāyāṃ sopi vaktavya iti śikṣārthaṃ paroktayoḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭasatpratipakṣayorvibhajyāntarbhāvoktyarthaṃ vā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7080: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇe“pratijñāyāḥ samabalavirodha eva sapratisādhana“ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7082: anyathā śiṣyamativaiśadyār 1 thaṃ vyutpādana 2 manumatameveti na svīyavyavahāravirodha iti sudhayā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:7083: na cātra prabalatvādiviśeṣaṇasya prayojanamastītyādisudhayā ca virodhāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7104: atrārucibījaṃ ta asādhakatvajñāpanamātreṇa parasya parājaye kimatyantābhāvasādhakatvajñāpanena/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7106: ata eva sādhyāprasiddheradoṣatve 'pi“anarvacanīyāsiddheraprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣa“iti pararītyā tatra tatravyavahāra iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7126: sādhāraṇatvādirūpeṇaiva 2 jñātasya pratibandhakatvāt lakṣaṇānurodhena pratyekameva hetvābhāsatvamityuktatvena,
GSP29vytrkt3u:7128: nanu maharṣiṇā svarūpasatā koṭidvayopasthāpakatvenānaikāntikatrayaṃ parāmarśaviṣayābhāvatvena cāsiddhatrayamekīkṛtya
GSP29vytrkt3u:7131: tenaiva rūpeṇa jñātasya pratibandhakatvādityuktatvena lakṣaṇānurodhena pratyekameva hetvābhāsatvamiti coktatvena sādhāraṇatvāsādhāraṇatvānupasaṃhāritvānāṃ pṛthagdoṣatvokteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7132: tathāsiddhyuktiprastāve 5 āśrayāsiddhiḥ svarūpaṇāsiddhiḥ vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ pratyekameva doṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7136: nanvetadevāśaṅkya maṇau svarūpasatānugatarūpeṇa trayamekīkṛtya maharṣiṇā vibhagakaraṇādityuktamityatastatadāśaṅkyāha -- nanviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7138: 1.katvam -ṭa. dhanaṃ-ṭa.rā. 2. jñānasya -ṭa.rā. 3.vanācca -ka. vyatvācca -ga.rā. vyācca -ṭa. 4.prathamavibhāga evetyārabhya etāvān granthaḥ nāsti -ga.rā. 5.ke cā-ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:7143: tathātve sākṣātpratibandhakatvena bādhapratirodhayorvyāptirahitaliṅgatvena savyabhicāra 1 viruddhayorapyekīkaraṇaṃ syādityādyatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7145: asādhakatāsādhakanādivyavahārānupayogitvena niṣphale vibhāge nirmaryādaṃ pravṛttasya pramāṇaparatantratvena niyantuṃ śakyatvāditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7150: nanu maṇāvevamevāśaṅkya svatantrecchāyā niyogaparyanuyogāviṣayatvāditi samāhitamiti bhāvena tadāśaṅkya nirāha -- svantreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7157: ubhayakoṭyupasthāpakatāvacchedakarūpavatvaṃ ca sādhāraṇatvādi tena rūpeṇa jñātasya pratibandhakatvādi 3 tyādimaṇyādyukterāha -- sādhāraṇetyādineti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7165: tathāhi -- sādhāraṇatvaṃ pakṣatrayavṛttitvaṃ cedvipakṣavṛttitvena 1 śepavaiyarthyam syāt 2/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7172: etenāvyāptiṃ pratyupajīvyatvāvdyabhicāra eva doṣa iti avyāptyajñānadaśāyāṃ vyabhicārajñānenāpyanumitipratibandhadarśanāvdyabhicāropi doṣa iti 3 ca nirastam/

GSP29vytrkt3u:7744: maṇyuktadiśā prakārāntareṇa viruddhasya pṛthagdoṣatvamanūdya nirāha -- eteneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7756: na hi hetoḥ sādhyābhāvena saṃbandhaṃ 1 jñātvā tena vyāpyatā jñātuṃ śakyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7757: tvatkalpitaṃ sādhyavyāpakābhāvapratiyogitvādirūpaṃ viruddhatvaṃ sādhyavyāpakābhāvapratiyogitvādirūpaṃ viruddhatvaṃ pratyapi vyāptyabhāva evojīvyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7758: tathāha --tvatkalpitasya viruddhatvasya svarūpeṇa jñānaṃ yadyapi na vyāptyabhāvajñānādhīnam /
GSP29vytrkt3u:7760: yattu pratibandhakaṃ vyāptyabhāvavyāpyatayā jñānaṃ 2 tadvyāptyabhāvajñānādhīnameveti kathaṃ vyāptyabhāvo nopajīvyaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7766: nanu maṇyuktaviruddhatvalakṣaṇe vyāptyabhāvasyopajīvyatvaṃ nāstītyata āha - tvaditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7771: maṇyuktaṃ prakārāntareṇa viruddhasya pṛthaktvaṃ nirāha --- eteneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7786: viruddhaḥ, viśiṣṭo 3 viraho vyāpyatvāsi 4 ddhaḥ iti bheda iti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7787: hetvābhāsaviśeṣabhūtā yā asiddhiḥ tadviśeṣabhūtā yā vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ tadavāntarabhedamādāya hetvābhāsasāmānyavibhāge hetvābhāsaviśeṣabhūtā yā asiddhiḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:7795: jñāyamānatve 6 satyanumitipratibandhakā 7 dirūpaṃ hetvābhāvasatvaṃ hi sāmānyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7802: tadviśeṣabhūtāyāḥ svarūpāsiddheḥ śabdo 'nityaḥ cākṣuṣatve sati dravyatvādityādau viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyaviśiṣṭābhāvamādāya hetvābhāsasāmānyavibhāgāpatteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7803: hetvābhāsaviśeṣasya bādhasya hṛdo dhūmavatve satyagnimānityādau viśiṣṭasādhyābhāvāntargataviśeṣaṇābhāvādibhedamādāya hetvābhāsasāmānyavibhāgaprasaṅgācca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7822: eva doṣo viśeṣaṇādyabhāvo 'pi viśiṣṭābhāvonnayanadvāraiva doṣa iti cet 1 samaṃ prakṛte 'pi 2 //
GSP29vytrkt3u:7828: tatrāpi sādhāraṇaviruddhayorvyāptyabhāvo niścitaḥ asādhāraṇānupasaṃhāriṇostu sandigdha iti jñeyam //
GSP29vytrkt3u:7835: nanu -- vyabhicārājñāne 'pi sahacāravirahajñānenāpyanumitipratibandho 'stīti vadantaṃ pratyavyabhicārasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptirityaṅgīkṛtyoktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7837: yena sāmānādhikaraṇyavirahasya 3 jñānaṃ pratibandhakamiti so 'pi pṛthagdoṣaḥ syāditi bhāvenāha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7841: 1.samaṃ iti na-ṭa.rā. 2.kḷptatvādanugatatvasya viśeṣaṇāṃśaviraharūpavyabhicāra eva doṣo 'stu na tu svatantra sāmānādhikaraṇyavirahaḥ kevalavyatirekiṇya satvāt -
GSP29vytrkt3u:7842: ṭa. ṇyapi sa -ga.rā. ityadhikam. hasya prakṛtepi bhāvenāha kiñceti ityasti -ṭa.ḍa.
GSP29vytrkt3u:7846: yattu paddhatau viruddhaḥ sādhyasaṃbaddhābhāve sati tadabhāvasaṃbandhitvādavyāptaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7849: tatra svamate triprakārā vyāptiḥ pratyekaṃ hetvābhāsa iti nābhiprāyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7850: kiṃ tu vastugatyā vidyamānāyāṃ paraiḥ pratyekaṃ hetvābhāsatvena svīkṛtāyāṃ triprakārāyāmavyāptāvanugatā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:7857: tatra hi pūrvaṃ svābhimatadoṣoktiprastāve hetuvirodho dvividhaḥ asiddhiravyāptiśceti,
GSP29vytrkt3u:7862: tathāca tatra sādhyatadabhāvasaṃbandhavatvādirūpeṇa pratyekahetvābhāsatvapratītestadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7863: kuta eṣobhiprāya ityato jñāpakaṃ vipakṣe bādhakaṃ cāha -- paddhatāvapīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7872: anyathā hi bhaṅgyantareṇa paroktaprakriyaiva svīkṛtā syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7881: anyathā paroktaprakriyāṅgīkārāpattiritye 2 kaṃ bādhakamuktvā bādhakāntaraṃ cāha -- sudhāyāmiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7882: na cātra viśeṣaṇavyavacchedyamastītyukta 3 bhedena tadvirodhaśca syādityanvayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7885_1: doṣatvaṃ vaktupupakramya pṛthagdoṣatvaṃ dūṣaṇamucyate idamasādhakaṃ anaikāntikatvādviruddhatvāditi tvayā vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt3u:7897: satve cānugatena laghunā sākṣādvyāptidhī 2 virodhidhīviṣayeṇa ca tenaivāsādhakatā sādhyatām/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7907: hetuvirodho dvividhaḥ asiddhiravyāptiriti pramāṇalakṣaṇādau yadvaividhyaṃ hetudoṣasyoktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7923: yaccoktaṃ maṇau -- bādhasyādoṣatve vastuto māhānasīyaḥ prasiddhau vahniḥ parvate vahnitvena sidhyet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7925: parvate mahānasīyo vahnirnāstīti pratyakṣabādhāttu na sidhyatīti bādhasya vyabhicārāsaṅkara iti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7930: svamate bādhasya vyabhicārāsāṅkaryaṃ 1 tadrītyanusaraṇe tatsāṅkaryameva prāpnoti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7931: tathā ca bādhasya pṛthagdoṣatvahāneḥ 2 pañceti hetvābhāsavibhāgabhaṅga iti bhāvenāha -- yacceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7932: nanu parvatīyadhūmasya mahānasīyavahnyabhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyena vyabhācirānna tena mahānasīyavahniḥ sidhyatītyata āha -- parvata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7933: vyāpakatāvacchedakatāvacchinnavyāpakābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyasyaiva vyabhicāratvādvahnitvasya vyāpakatāvacchedakatvena tadavacchedena 3 atra tasya satvādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7934: tarhi kuto na sidhyatītyata āha -- parvata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7936: kathaṃ tasya bādhatvena pārthakyamiti bhāvena nirāha -- tannetyādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7942: stīti pratyakṣasya parvate vahnirastīti pratyakṣaśābdabodhau pratīva parvate vahnirityanumitiṃ pratyapi bhinnaviṣayakatvenābādhakatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:7948_0: evaṃ tarhi mahānasīyavahniviṣayānumitiḥ kuto na jāyate parvatīyavahniviṣayaiva kuto
GSP29vytrkt3u:7948_1: jāyata ityato na tvaduktabādhadoṣabalāt kiṃ tu liṅgasya vyāptiprakāramapekṣya liṅgijñānajanakatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:7948_2: svabhāva iti svabhāvabalādeveti bhāvena dṛṣṭāntapūrvamāha -- yathā hīti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:7951: bādhasyādoṣatve samānaviṣayayatvasyaiva pratyakṣānumityorbādhakabādhyatvābhimatayoḥ syādityataḥ svabhāvakṛtameva bhinnaviṣayatvamityāha -- yathā hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7952: tathā ca sāmagryabhāvādeva mahānasīyavahnyasiddhyupapattau kiṃ bādhavaśena tadasiddhikalpanayā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7953: ata eva paddhatau“parvate dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'pi kathamanyatrā 4 numityanudbhavaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7965: astu vā pratyakṣānumityoḥ samānaviṣayakatvaṃ tathāpi na tanmātraṃ bādhatve tantram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7967: ghaṭavatyeva gehe ghaṭo nāstīti bhrāmyato 'pi gehe prameyamastīti pramayā tatra sato ghaṭasyāpi prameyatvena grahaṇadarśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7968: parvatetaravṛttirvahniḥ parvate nāstīti pramāvato 'pi parvato vahnimāniti bhrāntirūpānumitidarśanācca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7971: vyadhikaraṇadhūmavahnyorapi vyāpti 1 rastyeveti parvatīyadhūmo mahānasīyavahnijñānajananasvabhāva eveti bhinnaviṣayatvasvabhāvo neti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7974: tuṣyatu durjana ityabhyupetyāpi bādhyabādhakabhāvo na yukta ityāha -- astu veti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7975: mahānasīyavahniḥ parvate nāstīti pratyakṣasya parvato vahnimānityanumite 2 rityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7976: kuta ityarthaḥ samānaviṣayatvaṃ jñānasya bhramarūpajñānasya vā pramārūpajñānasya vā jñānāntarabādhakatve tantram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7979: yadvā samānaviṣayakatvaṃ jñānasya kiṃ tādṛśapramābādhane tantram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7983: atyantāsadeva bhrāntāsadeva bhrāntāvaropyata iti siddhānte samānaviṣayaka 3 tyābhāve 'pi maṇikṛnmate tadastītyāha --
GSP29vytrkt3u:7989: deśāntare sanneva bhrāntiviṣaya iti tvanmate parvatetaravṛttivahnereva bhrāntirūpānumitau parvatavṛttivahnitvena bhānāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7997: kḷptavyabhicārarūpadoṣādeva mahānasīyavahnyasiddhyupapattau na tadarthaṃ bādhasya doṣatetyāha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7998_1: 'pi śaktimupetya bādharūpadoṣādeva tadabhāvaṃ manyase tadā doṣāntaraṃ cāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:8004: tasmāttadaṃśe vyadhikaraṇadhūmādeḥ śaktireva neti bhinnaviṣayatvena prāguktapratyakṣānumityoḥ na bādhyabādhakābhāva ityeva yuktaḥ panthā iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8015: nanu sāmagrīsatve 'pi vyabhicārarūpakḷptadoṣādeva tatra gandhāsiddhirityata āha -- gandheti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8021: kathaṃ tarhi tatra bādha ityata āha -- prāgabhāveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8030: bādhasya ca tvayā tatra doṣatvānaṅgīkārāditi cet gandhaprāgabhāvavati gandhāpādakasāmagryā abhāvā-
GSP29vytrkt3u:8032: 1.api padaṃ na-ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 2.apipadaṃ na -ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 3.pi samā -ṭha.ḍa. 4.ekaṃ iti padaṃ na -ṭa.ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:8036: kiṃ ca prāgabhāvavati kāle gandhāpādanaṃ na tāva 1 tsiṣādhayiṣāmātreṇa/

GSP29vytrkt3u:8041: nāpi yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā gandha iti vyāptibalāttatāpādanam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8044: na hi dhūmena vahniḥ sidhyannarvāgbhāge kāle 2 ca sidhyati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8046: deveti bhāvena kā tatra tava sāmagrī abhimatā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8047_1: vā yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā gandha iti vyāptirvā svāvacchinnadeśakālīnasādhyabodhakasvabhāvo
GSP29vytrkt3u:8047_2: vā yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā gandhaprāgabhāvakālīnagandhavāniti vyāptirvā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:8052: sa tu prakṛte na bādhita iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8061: tathā ca pṛthivītvamapi svāvacchinne gandhaprāgabhāvakāle gandhaṃ bodhayedeva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8063: yatra yadā yadavacchedena dhūmastatra tadā tadavacchedena vahniriti vyāptireva hi tatrāsti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8064: prakṛte tu 1 yatra yadā yadavacchedena pṛthivītvaṃ tatra 2 tadā tadavacchedena gandha iti vyāptirnāstītyuktam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8066: kiṃ tu ghaṭaḥ gandhapragabhāvakālīnagandhavāniti sādhyaviśeṣaṇamiti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8069: etena dhūmānumāne daivānupanītakāñcanapayatvasya vahniviśeṣaṇatvena bhāne 'numiterapramātvā 4 dapramātvasya ca doṣādhīnatvādanyasya ca doṣasyābhāvādbādha eva -
GSP29vytrkt3u:8074: yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā ghaṭīyagandhaprāgabhāvasamānakālīno gandhaḥ ghaṭīya iti vyāpteḥ satve 'pi samānādhikaraṇatādṛśagandhena vyāpterabhimatatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8080: 1.yatra iti na- ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 2.tatra iti na- ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 3.gandha ityadhikam -ṭa. 4.tvāttadapra - rā.
GSP29vytrkt3u:8092: tatra ca doṣāntarābhāvādbādha eva doṣa iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8097_0: nanu satyapi tatra vyabhicāre tadapratisandhānadaśāyāṃ kāñcanamayo na bhavati vahniriti
GSP29vytrkt3u:8104: ananyagatyā bādhasya doṣatvaṃ vācyamiti śaṅkate -- nanviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8111_1: 'pi parāmarśe bādhena punarapi parāmarśavighaṭanasyāvaśyakatvenāsiddhi vyabhicārayonanyatarasya satvāt //
GSP29vytrkt3u:8118: doṣāntarasatvānna bādhasya ttara doṣatvaṃ kalpyamiti 1 pariharati-- niṣpanne 'pīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8134: kiṃ tu arthaniścayyaiva svapramātvaniścaye upajīvyateti vaiparītyameveti nirāha -- sādhyābhāveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8145: asmanmate tu bādhasya pratijñādoṣatvena vyabhicāra 1 śaṅkaiva nāstīti prāgevoktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8151: arthaniścayasya prāmāṇyaniścayāyattatva ityatra doṣāntaramāha -- parata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8152: sādhyābhāvarūpārthaniścayastatprāmāṇyaniścayādhīnaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayasya prāmāṇyagrāhakasya prāmāṇyaniścayādhīna ityevaṃ rūpeṇānavastheti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8161: udayanena tu nibandhe savyabhicārasya koṭidvayopasthāpakatayā sādhyatadabhāvasaṃśayaḥ phalam,
GSP29vytrkt3u:8167: idaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ svarūpasidatyetāvanmātreṇocyate asādhakatāliṅgatvena vā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:8172: maṇyādyuktarītyā pañcānāṃ hetvābhāsānāmasāṅkaryaṃ netyupapādyodayanamate 'pyāpātatosāṅkaryapratītāvapi tadayuktamiti bhāvena taduktamanūdya nirāha -- udayanena tviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8175: sādhāraṇānaikāntikasya sādhyatadabhāvābhyāṃ sahacāre asādhāraṇānupasaṃhāriṇorubhābhyāṃ sahacārābhāveneti dhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8176: prācāṃ mate 'sādhāraṇānupasaṃhāriṇoranadhyavasitaprabhedatvena pṛthagukteḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntika eva savyabhicāraśabdena grāhyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8193: tatra ca saṃśayajanakaṃ sādhyābhāvabuddhijanakatvaṃ ca kiṃ phalopādhānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ yogyatā vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8201: yadrūpeṇa hi jñānamanumitipratibdhakamityādinā pañcahetvābhāsa 7 tetyetkhaṇḍanaprastāve uktatvādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8216: kiṃ tatvamiti jijñasāyā anutpattau asādhakatvahetorasiddhiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8226: tathā ca dvayoḥ pratijñārthapramāṇaviruddhatvenaikas rūpeṇa prāguktadiśā pratijñādoṣatvameveti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8227: asmin pakṣe 'sādhakatānumānānutthānaṃ pratipakṣe syāditi doṣāntaraṃ cāha -- kiṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:8229: jijñāsā hi jñānecchā phalādanyatrecchā ceṣṭasādhanatvajñāne sati bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8232: jijñāsājanana 3 rūpaphalasya tadānīmabhāvena kiṃ tatvamiti jijñāsājanakatvāditi hetorabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8233: yogyatā veti pakṣaṃ nirāha -- nāntya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8236: 1.ddhyaikaika -ka.ga.ṭa. 2.ṣamevā-ṭa.ṭha.ḍa. 3.jananasvarūpayogyatvaheturabhimata iti yuktam. tasyottīrṇatādaśāyāmapi bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ ityasti - ṭha.ḍa.
GSP29vytrkt3u:8241: etena yaduktaṃ maṇikaṇṭhe-- sūtroktarītyā hetvābhāsāḥ pañcaiva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8243: tatra yadyapi viruddha 1 dvaye ca vyāptipramāvyatireko 'sti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8277: tatra ca vṛttimataḥ sapakṣavyāvṛttavvaṃ sandigdhāvyāptiriti saivodbhāvyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8280: evaṃ sādhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyamapi yatra hetustatra sādhyamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8287: anyathā parvato 'gnimān 4 pakṣatvādityādau prameyatveneva vṛkṣatvarūpeṇa vā jāte 'pi jñāne sādhyasaṃśayāpatteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8295: kiṃ caivaṃ sati vyāptasya pakṣadharmatvāpramitirūpāsiddhirapyāśrayahetusvarūpatadviśeṣaṇāsatvajñānanibandhanetyāśrayāsatvādīnāmapi hetvābhāsāntaratvaṃ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8296: nanucābhāvajñānādbhāpramāvyatirekaḥ sarvatranaitāvatāsādhāraṇa 1 tvaṃ sidhyati 2 yacceha nirūpyata iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8302: pramāvyatirekāviśeṣyavāntarabhedādbhoktau yo 'tiprasaṅga uktaḥ taduddhāramāśaṅkya sāmyena nirāha -- nanvityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8307: tāvatā hetvābhāsādhikyaṃ kuto netyata āha -- tacceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8308: bhāvapramāvyatirekaṃ prati yadasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeveha hetvābhāsaprakaraṇe vibhajcamānatvena nirūpyata ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8310: tathā ca sādhyābhāvavyāptarūpaviruddhasyānaikāntikadvayasya cāvyāptitvenaikadūṣaṇatvameva na tu tvaduktaprakāreṇānekahetvābhāsatvamiti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8318_0: yadi ca satpratikṣasya dvedhā 1 pratibandhakatāsādhāraṇyasādhāraṇī ca tatrāsādhāraṇamanumitipratibandhakatvamādāya
GSP29vytrkt3u:8321: nanvabhāvajñānasya bhāvapramāvyatirekahetutve hetvābhāsatvarūpāsādhāraṇadoṣatvaṃ vyāptyabhāvajñānasya na syādityataḥ pratibandīmukhena samādhātumāha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8350: tathāpi vyabhicāriṇi parārthānumāne sarvopasaṃhārapravṛttodāharaṇavākyādupādhyasphuraṇadaśāyāṃ vyāptigrahaṇa 2 sambhavāvdyāptyagraho nodbhāvayituṃ śakya iti vyabhicāra evodbhāvyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8351: viruddhe 3 tu viparītapratibandhe vākyasthe 'ntaraṅge sphurati sati bahiraṅgavyāptyajñānādikaṃ nodbhāvyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8353: bādhitasthale hetoḥ sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvena vyāpterapahāreṇa sandigdhasādhyavadvṛttitvābhāvena pakṣadharmatāpa 4 hāreṇetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8361: anityaḥ śabhdaḥ 5 prameyatvāt yatra 6 prameyatvaṃ tatrānityatvaṃ ghaṭādāviti vyabhicāriṇītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8363: pratibandho vyaptiḥ sādhyābhāvena saha hotorvyāptirūpaviparītavyāptau sphurantyāṃ nityaḥ -
GSP29vytrkt3u:8370: anadhyavasite tu vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena vyatirekaṇavyāpterdarśitatvānna vyāptyasiddhirudbhāvayituṃ śakyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8371: na cānadhyavasite sandigdhasādhyavatpakṣamātravṛttitvena sādhyābhāvasambandhādvyabhicāra evāstviti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8374: tanna/ vyabhicāriṇi tvayā samarthitena vyabhicārasyodbhāvytavenaiva maduktāvyāpterevodbhāvyatvasiddheḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8379_0: bhūrnityā gandhavatvāt yatra nityatvābhāvaḥ tatra gandhavatvābhāvo 2 jalādāviti sādhyābhāvahetvabhāvayorvipakṣavṛttitmukhena
GSP29vytrkt3u:8393: na cānityatvasādhakasya meyatvādergaganādau vyāptibhaṅge svena pramite 'pyanāptavādi 1 vākyādudāharaṇādeva vyāptisiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8396: kiñca yadi vyabhicāriṇi śakyodbhāvanatvādvyabhicāramādāya vyaptyapramitestyāgastarhi tata evāsiddherapi pakṣe hetva 2 satvamādāya pakṣe hetusatvāpramitirūpāsiddhirapi tyāgaḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8407: svasya hetu 5 tvābhāvaniścaye satyapi vādivākyāddhetusatvaniścayasya saṃbhavāditi bhāvenāha -- śabda iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8410: anudbhāvanaṃ tata eva śakyodbhāvanatvādevāstu ko doṣa ityata āha -- tataśceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8412: tvayā vyāptipakṣadharmatāvatvenāniścito heturasiddha iti tvayoktatvena tadapekṣayā hetvasatvamātraṃ hetvābhāsāntaraṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8414: paramukhenaivottaraṃ vācayitvā samamityāha -- tatra pakṣa iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8422: hetvasatvaṃ hetusatvānupalambhanirvāhyaṃ cet vyāptyabhāvarūpo vyabhicāro 'pi vyāptyanupalambhanirvāhya iti samam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8427: anyathopādhiḥ siddhasādhanaṃ ca saralatayā hetvābhāsāntaraṃ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8433: tathā cānupalambha eva doṣo 3 tu hetvasatvamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8441: parābhimatānadhyavasitapakṣe hetvābhāvasatvameva durghacaṃ kutontarbhāvacinteti bhāvenāha -- anadhyavasitepīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8444: yadapyanadhyavasite vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena vyatirekavyāpterdarśitatvānna vyāptyasiddhirudbhāvayituṃ śakyeti tatrāha -- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8445: tataścāvyāptireva doṣatvena kḷptatvādudbhāvyeti bhāvenāha -- kḷptaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8458: nanūktarūpānadhyavasitasyāvyāptijñānaṃ pratyupajīvyatvādayameva tatra doṣa iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8461: kiṃ ca sapakṣavipakṣayorliṅgajñānasya svayamajñāyamānatvena jñāyamānatayā pratibandhakībhūtāvyāptereva hetvābhāsatvena
GSP29vytrkt3u:8463: api cānukūlatarkāvatāradaśāyāmapi sapakṣavipakṣayorliṅga 3 jñānasya satvena tadāpyanumitipratibandhakatayā doṣatvāpātādityabhipretyāha -- iti digiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8490: nanu viruddha 3 vyabhicārītyapi kaści 4 ddhetvābhāsa ityāha -- sa eveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8492: pakṣavṛttitvaṃ sapakṣe satvaṃ vipakṣādvyāvṛttatvamityevaṃ rūpeṇa trirūpa ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8493: yathā vimataṃ mithyā dṛśyatvāt śaktirūpyavat- vimataṃ -
GSP29vytrkt3u:8525: vyāptivirahahetubhūtā veti hṛdi nidhāya krameṇāha -- na tāvadityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8540: kiṃ ca savyabhicāraviruddhānadhyavasiteṣu na tāvadavyāptirnāstīti yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8542: nāpyavyāpteḥ satve 'pi tadajñā 2 ne 'pi anyajñānādevānumānaṃ duṣṭamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:8549: nanvastvito 'nya 5 traiva kaścana prakāra ityata āha -- na ca hetvābhāsa 6 tva iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8561: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe -- asiddhiravyāpti 1 śca hetuvirodha iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:8563: oṃ iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadbrahmaṇyatīrtathapūjyapādānāṃ śiṣyeṇa śrīmavdyāsayatinā viracite śrīmattarkatāṇḍave anumānaprapañcanaṃ samāptam//
